2431230.name: Cyber NINJA that Climbs the City
2431230.detailed_description:
New action game, created with Unreal Engine 5!

Climb

The city is already corrupted.
Climb the skyscrapers of Tokyo and fend off the assassins of the Metropolitan Police Department.
Rescue the precious Grand Lady waiting for you at the top of the Radio Tower and dismantle the hostile corporate coalition.

■Cyberpunk city.
■Play through the simple game of three stages at once.
■The stage composition changes with each challenge.



■Use the physics to master the maneuvers and climb higher!



■Use hook shots to move and guns and swords to attack.
■Aerial battles with Tokyo cops.



■Never give up, no matter how many times you fall!

2431230.short_description: You, the NINJA, have to climb up the skyscrapers of Cyber Tokyo using your grapple, while destroying the Tokyo cops with your Katana and Beam Gun! Play simple run of three stages aiming for the top of the Cyber Tower of Tokyo!

2431280.name: Grandmasters Ascent
2431280.detailed_description:
Dive into an enthralling world where the precision of Chess merges seamlessly with the unpredictable thrill of card gaming.
Grandmasters Ascent challenges the player to a dual test: mastering the timeless strategy of Chess and the adaptability needed for card gaming.

Join the ranks of grandmasters in a game that’s set to redefine strategy.
Whether you're a Chess enthusiast, a card game lover, or someone looking for a fresh challenge, Grandmasters Ascent awaits you.
Prepare your deck, anticipate your opponent's moves, and prepare your checkmate!

2431280.short_description: Unleash the fusion of classic Chess strategy and electrifying card game mechanics. Navigate a familiar board with the unpredictability of your card deck. Choose your moves, strategize your plays, and outwit opponents in this riveting blend of tactics and chance. Ready for the ultimate duel?

2431260.name: Ad Victoriam
2431260.detailed_description:
Ad Victoriam is an indie game with a simple premise: "what would it have felt like to be on an ancient battlefield and observe the clash of armies unfolding?"

Using parallel computing, Ad Victoriam can simulate tens of thousands of soldiers all displayed in real time! Soldiers will maneuver together and fight in groups - at least that is, until the heat of battle causes them to break ranks and flee. We've put great emphasis on realism and immersion - soldiers neither mob as mindless zombies nor fight in perfect unison as permanent unit blocks.

The year is 59 BC. You, Julius Caesar, have become a Consul. It is time to seek fortune in conquest. New lands await, and perhaps one day Rome itself! To victory! Ad victoriam!

2431260.short_description: Ad Victoriam lets you experience large scale immersive battles and lead Caesar's legions to victory in a groundbreaking simulator! You can start up custom battles or play a full strategy game as you conquer Gaul and establish the Roman Empire!

2431290.name: Magnetron Rebellion: Fully Loaded Demo
2431290.detailed_description:
Magnetron Rebellion: Fully Loaded is a top-down shooter inspired by classics like Galaga with a major twist: you must use the enemy's bullets against them! Your ship is equipped with a powerful magnet capable of capturing the enemy bullets and firing them back at them! Just be warned, attempt to capture too many bullets at once and your magnet will be overloaded, unable to stop further bullets.

The demo version includes two levels to play through.

  • Master several levels filled with enemies all gunning to crush the rebellion.
  • Use the various types of enemy munitions to turn the tide of battle. Hitting a ship with the matching color will deal double damage!
  • Compete for the high score! Scores are uploaded to the Steam Leaderboard so you can brag to your friends!
  • Colorblind accessibility - change the color of the enemy ships to easily identify each type at a glance.

2431330.name: Galactic Grinder
2431330.detailed_description:
Galactic Grinder is a fast paced 2.5D side-scrolling skateboarding game, where the player skates through different planets while performing tricks to gain points to attain the best possible score.







This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

2431310.name: ANYU
2431310.detailed_description:
ANYU is a 3D third-person narrative exploration game, set in a frozen wasteland where an ancient civilization fell. Centered around movement puzzles and dealing with environment mechanics.

Ikku will face an arctic world and must reach the top of the mountain to finally get a glimpse of the northern lights. During the journey, he will encounter some helpful friends and the remnants of an ancient civilization.


Explore the frozen wasteland with your skis:

Interact with the world to progress:

Climb!






This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

2431320.name: Cat-aclysm
2431320.detailed_description:
In a peaceful rhythmic city run by music beats, lives a cat who is fed up with his owner constantly annoying him, and decides to run away from home, starting a revolution to take over the city. Vexa, desperate to hold Catuccino again, decides to follow him and get him back.


Traverse the beautiful city while you interact with it!


Get Catuccino back!


Battle the evil robocats and save the city!




This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

2431370.name: Cube Clash: Rumble and Smash
2431370.detailed_description:
Rumble and smash!
Cube Clash is an online fighting game in which you can pick a unique historically and pop-culture inspired cube fighter and smash your friends in sequences of one-hit rounds games.

In a world where everything is made up of cubes, in the era known as prehistory an event occurred that will lead to the greatest conflict for humanity. A caveman found a sphere, upon discovering it his fellow prisoners of greed proceeded to fight for the sphere, thus the war for the sphere began.

All known empires have the sphere in their possession, which led to their destruction. The holy wars were an excuse to get the sphere and even the second world war had to do with the sphere, until everything exploded with the creation of nuclear bombs.

But even in the remains of humanity, the fight continues to obtain the sphere.

Cube Clash features:
Local Multiplayer - now you can play with other friend, in the future they will be able to play up to 4 players at the same time.
Online Multiplayer - in development
Multiple Skins - you can choose between 9 skins now and in the future there will be more!
Huge catalog of weapons - find your own combat style!

2431480.name: Breached
2431480.detailed_description:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached," where the excitement of a roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly blends the adrenaline-pumping intensity of rapid-fire combat with the intricate strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay. Immerse yourself in an endlessly replayable journey, with each playthrough revealing new enigmas, delivering relentless battles deep within a mysterious hidden bunker, and uncovering a sinister conspiracy linked to a covert bioweapon project. Get ready to shape your one-of-a-kind character and face high-stakes confrontations while navigating a relentless wave of zombies and bio-modified soldiers, ensuring an experience that keeps you coming back for more.

Key Features


  • Roguelite Thrills: Embrace the roguelike challenge with a persistent progression system that keeps you coming back for more. Each run is a new chance to improve your character, unlocking new skills, weapons, and abilities as you push deeper into the game.

  • Twin-Stick Mayhem: Hone your skills in a dynamic twin-stick control scheme, offering full control over your character's movement and precise aiming. Unleash a torrent of bullets and make split-second decisions in the heat of battle.

  • Replayable Levels: Venture into worlds filled with diverse environments, enemies, and power-ups. each time starts at a different location in the map with great replayability

  • Upgrade and Customization: Gather resources and unlock a vast array of weapons, abilities, and character enhancements. Tailor your loadout and abilities to match your preferred playstyle and adapt to the ever-evolving threats.

  • Fast-Paced Action: Engage in relentless battles against waves of hordes, with quick reflexes and strategic decision-making being your keys to survival. Dodge bullets, exploit enemy weaknesses, and unlock the path to victory.

  • Strategic Choices: Navigate your way through a web of choices, from selecting routes through the game world to deciding which upgrades to prioritize. Your strategic decisions will determine your success.

  • Unlockable Content: Unearth hidden secrets and unlock new characters, weapons, and game modes as you delve deeper into the mysterious bunker filled with bio-modified soldiers

  • Immersive Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game's dynamic soundtrack, designed to intensify the action and keep your heart pounding.

  • Quick Replays: Get right back into the action with seamless restarts, ensuring you'll want to dive into just one more thrilling run.

Step into an unrelenting world where every attempt brings new possibilities, rewards, and challenges. Will you harness your skills and strategy to survive the breached bunker filled with zombies and bio-modified soldiers?

2431450.name: Casting Whispers Demo
2431450.detailed_description:
As Victoria, you've come to check in on your elderly mentor, Professor Henry Zubringer, who has nobody to check on him during a bad storm in the city of Corburgh. The professor was always protective of his research, never letting you learn much about it as you assisted him. But it turned out that what he was studying was much closer to home, and much more dangerous, than he had ever let on. Now it sees you, and it wants you to see it.

Gameplay

Casting Whispers is a first person horror game where you will need to use both sight and sound to keep yourself safe and further your investigation. You will need to close your eyes in-game to listen for clues in the environment, and keep a wary eye open for small changes in your environment. Things are not as they may seem.

Key Features

  • Highly atmospheric investigation in a dangerous place.
    Use more than sight to navigate your environment.
  • Cosmic horror.
    The thing in the building is not of our world. Its motivations are unclear. It no more comprehends you than you comprehend it.

Investigate the run-down apartment building that your mentor seems to have vanished in, while an alien interdimensional being vies for your attention and, possibly, your life.

2431421.name: The Paper Arcade: Kingdom Kitty
2431421.detailed_description:
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Match-3 RPG Edition"! Get ready to embark on an epic adventure filled with magical gems, powerful spells, and thrilling battles.

In this game, you will take on the role of a brave hero, whose mission is to collect magical gems by matching them in groups of three or more. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter challenging enemies and powerful bosses, which you'll need to defeat using a combination of strategic gem matching and powerful spells.

2431490.name: 英雄之旅
2431490.detailed_description:
《英雄之旅》是一款适合摸鱼时玩的放置挂机类游戏，核心玩法就是打怪刷装备，穿更好的装备打更强的怪，体验爆极品装备的快感。

相对于其他挂机游戏，《英雄之旅》的旅途不是无尽的，也不会一关卡住好几天。玩家每次上线都能感受到战斗力提升，最终目标是战胜罪魂之塔500层首领。未来还会为想收集极品装备的玩家更新困难模式。

下面是游戏内功能概览，希望能帮助大家更好地体验游戏。

战斗


游戏内的英雄会自动战斗，战胜10波小怪后可以挑战本关首领。战胜怪物有概率获得金币、装备、技能碎片、伙伴和钻石等。

设置


可以关闭音乐、修改分辨率等。

地图


战胜本关首领后可以进入到下张地图，越靠后的地图怪物等级越高，掉落的装备也越好。

属性


角色升级后可以获得属性点，力量影响攻击力、体质影响生命值。伤害代表队伍整体的输出能力、坚韧代表队伍整体的防御能力。

背包


背包内装备名字后面的数字代表如果你装备了这件装备，你的能力会变化多少，红色代表提升，绿色代表下降。+-代表提升伤害、降低坚韧，-+代表降低伤害、提升坚韧。

强化


可以将不需要的装备熔炼获得强化石，运气好还会获得新的装备。使用强化石可以强化装备基础属性，更换装备保留强化等级。

技能


收集一定数量的技能碎片自动升级。可以配置两套技能（单体、群体），战斗中会根据敌人数量不同自动更换。每个技能有不同的释放概率，会优先释放靠上的技能。

商店


使用金币购买装备，价格越贵的商品获得高品质装备概率越高。如果大量购买经常提示“背包已满”，可以在设置中开启“购买后自动一键熔炼”。

天赋


角色升级后可以获得天赋点，你可以选择升级属性、伙伴或者技能。游戏满级为1000级，刚好可以全部点满。

伙伴


战斗胜利有概率获得伙伴，两个同名伙伴可以合成一个更高级别的伙伴。不同级别副属性不同，虽然主属性按照比例继承主角，但是可以自由分配属性点和配置技能。

称号


完成对应任务可以解锁称号，称号附加的属性永久生效。

图鉴


获得新装备可以解锁图鉴，解锁数量越多属性加成越高。

挑战


战胜对应副本首领后可以获得金币、钻石、技能、伙伴等。每个副本每4小时增加一次挑战次数，最多保留20次。

罪魂之塔


罪魂之塔战斗胜利可以获得神器点和幸运值，幸运值越高获得的装备和伙伴品质越高。500层首领是整个游戏最难的关卡。

神器


使用神器点可以解锁或升级神器，使用钻石可以重置所有神器。点击对应神器上的锁头图标可以锁定，避免被重置。

竞技场


挑战队伍胜利后可以获得圣火，可以将圣火供奉给女神获得属性值加成。每小时增加一次挑战次数，最多保留40次。

铁匠铺


在铁匠铺可以对仓库内的装备使用高级熔炼，高级熔炼不会失败。每4小时增加一次次数，最多保留20次。

幻化


到达70关后战斗胜利可以获得幻化币，使用幻化币解锁形象可以获得永久属性。

2430590.name: True Maze Defiance
2430590.detailed_description:
Welcome to the challenging world of "True Maze Defiance"! In this game, you'll be tasked with guiding a ball through a treacherous maze filled with obstacles and hazards. Your goal is simple: get the ball from the beginning to the end without falling into any of the holes or getting blocked by any of the obstacles.

But don't be fooled by the simplicity of this task! The maze is deviously designed to test your skills and reflexes to the limit. You'll need to stay sharp and focused if you hope to make it through each level.

In "True Maze Defiance," if you fall into a hole, you will either be sent back to the beginning of the level or the last checkpoint, depending on your progress. This adds to the challenge and encourages careful navigation through the maze. So, keep your wits about you and stay focused on reaching the finish line.

To add to the challenge, there are also diamonds scattered throughout the maze. These diamonds come in a variety of colors and each has its own unique properties. Some will give you extra points, while others will help you navigate through the maze more easily.

The mouse tilt control is responsive and intuitive, allowing you to make quick adjustments and changes in direction as needed. It feels natural and intuitive, making it easy for players of all ages and skill levels to pick up and play.

So, are you ready to take on the ultimate maze challenge? Do you have what it takes to navigate the twists and turns of "True Maze Defiance"? Only time will tell. Good luck, and may the maze gods be with you!

2430580.name: Astrosmash
2430580.detailed_description:
ASTROSMASH® was originally designed by John Sohl for the Intellivision® console in 1981 and quickly became one of the most popular games of its time. It sold more than a million copies and earned its spot in the top-5 best-selling Intellivision® games ever. In this space-themed game, players use a laser cannon to destroy incoming meteors, bombs, and other targets.

In ASTROSMASH® you control a laser cannon that scrolls left or right along a flat plane to target falling objects, such as large or small meteors, spinning bombs, guided missiles, or an UFO that crosses the screen from time to time at higher levels. Low hills and stars are seen in the background.

There are many types of targets, each of which may move at various speeds. As the game advances, the range of speed increases.

The game has ten levels, each of which features different objects. Each level is represented by a different beautiful background and amazing background music. Sounds and background music are perfectly synchronized with the gameplay. This is a masterpiece compiled by famous composer Tommy Tallarico. He has won over 35 industry awards and has worked on more than 300 game titles.



Players have the option to fire single shots by pressing the fire button or to switch to automatic fire with multiple shots per second. The hyperspace option moves the laser cannon to a random location, which may or may not be safer than the starting point.

This ASTROSMASH® reincarnation is much more exciting, more visually appealing, and somewhat more challenging without straying from the game’s original theme and gameplay. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music – compiled by the famous game music composer Tommy Tallarico – adds incredible excitement to this video game classic. Plus, ASTROSMASH® now enables players to co-operate or play against each other; locally or online – even across platforms - for up to four players.

In addition you are also able to play the old original Intellivision® ASTROSMASH® from 1981. Please enjoy ASTROSMASH® from today and from the past!

  • Single player mode
  • Co-op and versus mode
  • Local and online multiplayer modes up to 4 players (cross platform)
  • 10 different levels
  • Different kind of enemies like spaceships, asteroids, UFOs
  • Fantastic graphics
  • Superb sounds compiled and designed by famous game music composer Tommy Tallarico
  • Original version from 1981 included
  • Keyboard and Joystick support
2430580.about_the_game:
ASTROSMASH® was originally designed by John Sohl for the Intellivision® console in 1981 and quickly became one of the most popular games of its time. It sold more than a million copies and earned its spot in the top-5 best-selling Intellivision® games ever. In this space-themed game, players use a laser cannon to destroy incoming meteors, bombs, and other targets.

In ASTROSMASH® you control a laser cannon that scrolls left or right along a flat plane to target falling objects, such as large or small meteors, spinning bombs, guided missiles, or an UFO that crosses the screen from time to time at higher levels. Low hills and stars are seen in the background.

There are many types of targets, each of which may move at various speeds. As the game advances, the range of speed increases.

The game has ten levels, each of which features different objects. Each level is represented by a different beautiful background and amazing background music. Sounds and background music are perfectly synchronized with the gameplay. This is a masterpiece compiled by famous composer Tommy Tallarico. He has won over 35 industry awards and has worked on more than 300 game titles.



Players have the option to fire single shots by pressing the fire button or to switch to automatic fire with multiple shots per second. The hyperspace option moves the laser cannon to a random location, which may or may not be safer than the starting point.

This ASTROSMASH® reincarnation is much more exciting, more visually appealing, and somewhat more challenging without straying from the game’s original theme and gameplay. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music – compiled by the famous game music composer Tommy Tallarico – adds incredible excitement to this video game classic. Plus, ASTROSMASH® now enables players to co-operate or play against each other; locally or online – even across platforms - for up to four players.

In addition you are also able to play the old original Intellivision® ASTROSMASH® from 1981. Please enjoy ASTROSMASH® from today and from the past!

  • Single player mode
  • Co-op and versus mode
  • Local and online multiplayer modes up to 4 players (cross platform)
  • 10 different levels
  • Different kind of enemies like spaceships, asteroids, UFOs
  • Fantastic graphics
  • Superb sounds compiled and designed by famous game music composer Tommy Tallarico
  • Original version from 1981 included
  • Keyboard and Joystick support
2430580.short_description: ASTROSMASH® was originally a Shoot´em up game for the Intellivision® console in 1981. This reimagined version is based on the game’s original theme and gameplay but much more exciting and challenging. The new graphics are phenomenal and the amazing background music adds a lot of excitement.

2430620.name: Castle of Terror
2430620.detailed_description:
Originally released in 1985 for the Commodore 64, this classic graphical text adventure from the same studio that brought you The Hobbit saw players enter the world of Count Dracula. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

You begin your adventure in a small village near the castle of Count Dracula. Use simple text phrases to move through the world and interact with objects and people, but watch out! The world is a dangerous and unforgiving place when Dracula is involved - keep your wits about you and perhaps you will prevail.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

2430650.name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Son of Gunpowder
2430650.detailed_description:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Consumable:

- The Conspirator (Hunter)
- Crown Cinders (Martini-Henry)
- Royal Sabotage (Scottfield)
- Forefather's Fury (Vitality Shot)


The Conspirator

The flames of November 5th taught the self-proclaimed heir of the Gunpowder Plot not to speak out against unjust rule, but the fires of war taught him silence was untenable. Taking up his forefather’s crusade, The Conspirator reforges himself in the furnace of the bayou.


Crown Cinders

This Martini-Henry IC1 was standard issue, and The Conspirator carried it across the seas. A mark of pride in his actions, it was burned during its retrieval on that fateful Bonfire Night.


Royal Sabotage

The Conspirator proved a few well-placed shots can sink warships. Now, this humble Scottfield Revolver is a dependable weapon in slaying even supernatural foes, adorned with a legacy of raging fire.


Forefather’s Fury

The Conspirator made this Vitality Shot by mixing a balm he concocted for his own burns with the healing science he found in Louisiana. It provides a rare moment of relief from his constant pains.


Rumors began to spread through the decks of Britain’s Atlantic fleet: a traitor was in their midst. The two ships that sank near Cape Verde did not go down by accident—and the perpetrator must have been among the survivors who were rounded up for interrogation. Three walked the plank, found guilty of conspiracy, but it didn’t stop another ship from sinking that same night. A frenzy spread amongst the soldiers, and the officers executed all remaining survivors of the sunken ships. With the crisis averted, calm spread through the fleet once again—until fire and oil burst forth from the head ship in an explosion that razed the armada.

A dozen ships were scuppered, but the culprit was ultimately found: a single humble officer. With naught but his service rifle, revolver, and a penchant for gunpowder’s destruction, he had decimated the fleet. Such a heinous crime demanded he be made an example of and humiliated, lest other would-be rebels take inspiration. On trial, the man proclaimed himself to be Francis Fawkes, heir to Guy Fawkes and dedicated to his ancestor’s mission.

He was sentenced to burning at the stake. On November 5th, The Conspirator was paraded in the streets and burned atop a historic bonfire: bound, masked, and dressed as an effigy to be mocked by what remained of the Navy. The flames of consequence melted his skin and welded the mask to his visage. In total agony, childhood memories flooded his mind in a fever dream: a sickly father’s pained groans, a vagrant mother’s bitter tears, and a frail grandmother’s lullaby—wondering about life if history had been different. Spiteful, The Conspirator lived long enough for the fire to burn through his restraints. Survivors of his wrath say he descended with eerie, royal poise. Spectators fled and homes burned as The Conspirator searched for water. To this day, those streets remain rubble and ash.

Pleased with his work, and with intentions to someday finish the Gunpowder Plot’s mission, The Conspirator fled. Hearing of good money and good use for his spite-fueled talents, he made his way to the bayou, continuing a lifelong crusade.

2430680.name: Hope is Gone
2430680.detailed_description:
See also


About the Game

Hope is Gone is a first-person action horror game with a retro art style.

You play as Zoe, an ordinary woman who has made many mistakes in the past. Zoe takes a bus to go to the hospital where her husband is hospitalized, but falls asleep. When she wakes up, she is in a totally decadent and dark parallel dimension. The beings of this world hate humans and will do anything to capture Zoe and any other human.

Survival-horror:

The inhabitants of this decadent world will come after you, fight to defend yourself or run away to save resources. Don't get lost. Stay alert.

Explore:

This decadent world is very different from ours, explore the environments to find routes to your destination and look for items that will help you survive.

Discover:

There are many secrets hidden in this strange world. In fact, there are also many dark secrets in Zoe's past. Discover the secrets and understand your destiny.

2430690.name: Clover Day's Plus
2430690.detailed_description:
STORY:

Bottled-up emotions...
An everlasting oath...
Heartfelt desires...
An enduring regret...
And a childhood promise.

Yuuto was abandoned by his parents and raised in an orphanage in Britain before a trading merchant by the name of Takakura Yoshiomi adopted him and brought him to Japan.

He could barely speak the language, but he had the support and love of his two new sisters, the cheery yet shy Anzu, and the calm, collected Anri.
During his time in elementary school, he also made new friends: the ingenuous and kind Tsubame, and the ostentatious but guarded Izumi.

They were young and oblivious to love back then. They laughed together, cried together, and nurtured irreplaceable bonds with one another.



Ten years later...

The landscape of the town has changed, and so have they.

Yet some things never do change, no matter how much time passes.

"Do you still remember the promise we made that day?"

Ten years ago, during their childhood, there was another pair of twins that they all played with.
Hekiru and Hikaru reappear and the emotions that have since frozen in time are now rekindled.
This marks the beginning of their resplendent time together, their "Clover Days."

2430710.name: Operator: Observation
2430710.detailed_description:
**Every Design or Picture of this Page is subject to change because the Game is still in Early Developement**

You are an Operator. As part of the House-Safety Incorporated, you were moved to one of their Facilities deep down in the Ground. The Only Thing they want you to do is look at the Monitors and don't make any Problems. They call you the Observer for a Good Reason. You Observe a Home of People who were evacuated a long time ago. Your Instructor says that you need to find anomalies and Report them. But in addition, you are an Operator. So you need to assign certain Special Task Forces to the Anomalys which then will be removed. But the Anomalies get stronger every Shift. And your Days just go by and by.

Game Info

This Game is inspired and built on the Base of Observation Duty but tries to make its Universe out of this concept. An Instructor tells you the Way this will work. Then your First Shift starts. Every Morning after your Shift ends at around 6-8 AM you must do your last Maintenance Work before going home for the Rest of the Day. But you slowly start to realize that the Anomalies you are watching aren't dangerous for you behind the Monitor.

Camera System

This Game has 5 different Night Shifts where the Cameras are your best Friend. Use the Cameras to look into each Room and find anomalies. Maybe it's the Chair that moved? Or wait... was the Picture always like that? Or maybe something you only can hear? WHO KNOWS? find it out!

Report and Taskforce Menu

If you found an Anomaly you need to Report it. If there is an Anomaly you will be able to Assign a Taskforce to it. That will be the Thing you'll be doing the most in the Game. There are (4-12) Anomaly Types Scattered around (4-12) Rooms. The Rooms get harder each night and will face you with a different Challenge. Hopefully, you are ready.

Shift End

Of course, you also have a Normal Life in the City. Since Humans died in most countries because of the anomalies it's even more important that you do your job right. The Whole City counts on you. Sometimes you may need to get something to eat or otherwise do something in the Morning, before you need to return to your Work.

Anomalies

From Light to real Shapeshifter Anomalies almost everything will be there waiting for you. Fight for your Job and the Life of Innocent Civilians who are counting on you.

So. Operator. What are you Waiting for? Hop in and help Humanity survive one of the most critical Situations you were ever found in. And. DONT. GIVE. UP

- A Message from The CEO of House-Safety INC

Your Instructor will follow you on the way to becoming a good Operator.

2430730.name: My Child Lebensborn Remastered
2430730.detailed_description:
My Child: Lebensborn is a story-driven nurture game based on true events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through alongside them. Adopt a boy or girl, and support them through a defining year of their life.

You adopt a young Lebensborn child in Norway after WW2, but parenting will be hard as your child grows up in a hostile and hateful environment. See a different side of the war, inspired by the true stories of the Lebensborn children. Discover how hatred of our enemies continues to create victims, even after victory.



Discover their past and support them in the present. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying, and the passing of blame.

Can you help Klaus/Karin cope with the heavy inheritance of the German occupation, so they will find their place in a country that is celebrating its freedom?
You can make a difference.



Daily life interaction
The game is full of realistic elements of simulated nurturing. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child - should you play more with your child or work overtime to be able to afford better food? Look for the effects of your choices on your child’s expressions and body language.



Use your time and meager resources wisely
Earn money as you work, then cook, craft, forage and play.



Taking care of your children is also one of the most important tasks of being their guardian, apart from taking care of their food, bathing, school and shopping, you also need to work, tell them stories, sew their clothes and, above all, write letters to help them find the truth and their relatives. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying and the passing of blame.

Explore a gripping storyline based upon true events

Experience how hatred towards an enemy can create victims even in times of peace. You will experience the suffering your child has to go through due to a hostile and abusive society, watching them lose warmth and happiness.





More activities:
Spend more time with your child and enjoy a variety of activities together as your little one grows.

Make new memories:
Your journal now holds more memories from the year you spent together with your child. Who can throw away the beautiful flowers you picked out together on a beautiful spring day? Decorate the rooms with your memories. Your journal will hold your struggles, as well as the happy moments.

Interact with your child:
Play and interact with your child more freely in this remastered version. Manage your time and resources while trying as many activities with your child as possible! Money is limited as always, but perhaps there are more reasons to not work overtime after all.

Improved Graphics:
Bringing My Child Lebensborn's graphics to today's level, tickle and pet your child to get heartwarming reactions out of them! The beauty of Norwegian nature is now more apparent, and you have more things to do outdoors!



Warning: This game is based on difficult and heavy topics, not suitable for young children.
2430730.about_the_game:
My Child: Lebensborn is a story-driven nurture game based on true events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through alongside them. Adopt a boy or girl, and support them through a defining year of their life.

You adopt a young Lebensborn child in Norway after WW2, but parenting will be hard as your child grows up in a hostile and hateful environment. See a different side of the war, inspired by the true stories of the Lebensborn children. Discover how hatred of our enemies continues to create victims, even after victory.



Discover their past and support them in the present. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying, and the passing of blame.

Can you help Klaus/Karin cope with the heavy inheritance of the German occupation, so they will find their place in a country that is celebrating its freedom?
You can make a difference.



Daily life interaction
The game is full of realistic elements of simulated nurturing. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child - should you play more with your child or work overtime to be able to afford better food? Look for the effects of your choices on your child’s expressions and body language.



Use your time and meager resources wisely
Earn money as you work, then cook, craft, forage and play.



Taking care of your children is also one of the most important tasks of being their guardian, apart from taking care of their food, bathing, school and shopping, you also need to work, tell them stories, sew their clothes and, above all, write letters to help them find the truth and their relatives. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying and the passing of blame.

Explore a gripping storyline based upon true events

Experience how hatred towards an enemy can create victims even in times of peace. You will experience the suffering your child has to go through due to a hostile and abusive society, watching them lose warmth and happiness.





More activities:
Spend more time with your child and enjoy a variety of activities together as your little one grows.

Make new memories:
Your journal now holds more memories from the year you spent together with your child. Who can throw away the beautiful flowers you picked out together on a beautiful spring day? Decorate the rooms with your memories. Your journal will hold your struggles, as well as the happy moments.

Interact with your child:
Play and interact with your child more freely in this remastered version. Manage your time and resources while trying as many activities with your child as possible! Money is limited as always, but perhaps there are more reasons to not work overtime after all.

Improved Graphics:
Bringing My Child Lebensborn's graphics to today's level, tickle and pet your child to get heartwarming reactions out of them! The beauty of Norwegian nature is now more apparent, and you have more things to do outdoors!



Warning: This game is based on difficult and heavy topics, not suitable for young children.
2430730.short_description: My Child Lebensborn is a story-driven nurture game based on real events. Play as the adoptive parent of Karin or Klaus, and experience the struggles they go through alongside them. 2430760.name: Family Arcade
2430760.detailed_description:
'Tis the season to be gaming 🎄

Looking for a way to make your next game night or family gathering even more fun? Look no further than Family Arcade.
Our jam-packed collection is the ultimate stress reliever, guaranteed to bring out your inner child and have you laughing all night long.

Make your holiday season unforgettable with our selection of games that are sure to get everyone into the Christmas spirit 🎅

Our games are perfect for all ages and skill levels, so everyone can join in on the fun. From classic party games to the latest hits, Family Arcade has something for everyone:

🎲 Scavenger Hunt is tailored for young minds.
🎲 Pop the Pumpkin is a great game for teens who are looking for a fun and more challenging experience.
🎲 Hyperdrive is crafted for mature players seeking an adrenaline-fueled experience.
🎲 Wordsmith is designed to appeal to seniors who are looking for a fun and mentally stimulating activity.

In addition to our wide selection of Christmas games, our Home screen also features over an hour of Christmas songs to get everyone in the holiday mood!

Perfect for family game nights or solo holiday cheer, this pack will bring hours of fun and nostalgia to your home!

This game is a rhythm game in which cats dance to phonk.


Each card in the game has its own level of difficulty. For passing the map you get points and cash, which you can spend on customizing your cats.

  • Ability to play both alone and against your friend.
  • Lots of different phonk tracks you're sure to enjoy
  • Cool cats!

Hurry up and enter the world of beautiful phonk, you won't want to leave it!

2430750.name: The King's Campaign Soundtrack
2430750.detailed_description:
Originally composed for Medieval Kingdom Wars, this soundtrack includes a bonus track for The King's Campaign, and captures the drama, danger, and diplomacy of the Hundred Years' War

Composer Joel Steudler summons the spirit of the era through period-appropriate instruments mixed with powerful orchestral punch. Crumhorns, recorders, and the Viola da Gamba (played by Isabel Esain) evoke the sound of ancient times when kings and knights shaped the world

Melodic themes and thundering drums will carry you into an action packed listening experience!

2430770.name: Violet Bricks
2430770.detailed_description:
Get into action with Violet Bricks, an exciting puzzle game featuring Violet, a brave heroine who needs to defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels. Inspired by classics like Arkanoid, the game features modern 3D graphics and a variety of power-ups to collect.

Developed by Vektro Digital, this is a game that will test your skills and offer plenty of modernized nostalgic fun!


Features:
- Original arts 3d and 2d!
- 10 different power ups!
- Some kinds of bricks and many colours!

2430800.name: Laser Survivor
2430800.detailed_description:
You woke up in an abandoned space station
You need to somehow try to get out of this inhospitable place that is teeming with dangerous creatures

Features

  • Auto-firing main and secondary weapons
  • Semi-automatic laser turrets: your only allies that differ from map to map
  • One active skill — jetpack dash
  • Many jet backpacks to choose from with different slots, stats and mechanics!
  • Free stats upgrades after every level up
  • A lot of items available to buy in the shop between waves
  • Waves system with rounds 20-100 sec

2430820.name: Squab
2430820.detailed_description:
Squab is an exciting precision platform adventure that puts players in control of a young pigeon full of energy but unable to fly. Using the dash as his main means of locomotion, players embark on a challenging journey to rescue his missing father, Maximus.

Prepare to overcome a variety of challenges while navigating vibrant and dangerous environments. With engaging game mechanics and thrilling gameplay, Squab offers a unique experience that will test your skills and leave you craving more.

  • Over 60 levels


  • 3 Biomes


  • Stay alert to all challenges

2430860.name: Sea of Chaos
2430860.detailed_description:
"The Sea of Chaos" is a casual real-time strategy game where you can develop characters. In this game, you are born into a chaotic sea with a small floating land.

You need to:

1.Collect resources and expand your land.
2.Recruit members and build defensive structures to fend off randomly generated enemies, each unique.
3.Construct various buildings to strengthen your base and unlock technologies to enhance structures.
4.Choose members with excellent traits, arm them thoroughly, and venture into the depths of the sea to gain greater power.
5.Defeat enemies and imprison them. During battles, you can release them from prison, and they will fight for you.
6.In addition to these, you can also: surround your base with sturdy walls and engage in street fighting with enemies, encounter various interesting or dangerous random events.

Your character will not truly die, and you will not be completely defeated. You can play freely and casually.

More content is currently in production and optimization...

2430810.name: Roll the Dark Heart
2430810.detailed_description:
A creepy and dangerous world, no matter where your feet lead you, only fog awaits ahead, which seemingly mercilessly mocks the troubles of the still living and already dead creatures of this world, among which man is far from being at the top of the food chain. Can you adapt to the rules of this world and survive? And if you can - can you continue to call yourself a man or will you turn into a kind of hordes of monsters aimlessly loitering around?

Features:
- The battle is divided into phases instead of the classic format when the player and the enemy act in strict order, at the beginning you lay out the cards on the table, then you play the action cards and then the creature cards you put up act, your cards and enemy cards act one after the other depending on the speed
- Wide choice of classes and cards to build your deck
- Perhaps the developer will not starve to death if you buy the game

2430830.name: Strongblade - Puzzle Quest and Match-3 Adventure
2430830.detailed_description:
Strongblade is a vibrant, match-3 puzzle adventure with an irresistible charm. As Sean the Mouse, you'll navigate through a stunning world full of puzzles and obstacles, make friends with lovable animal characters, and outsmart crafty villains.

The game features over 30 distinct mechanics and thousands of levels, each packed with thrilling power-ups and combinations. Beyond just solving puzzles, you'll be exploring new territories, setting up and decorating unique campsites, and unearthing treasure chests filled with coins, power-ups, and boosters.

The excitement doesn't stop there. Strongblade lets you compete in heart-pounding in-game events against players from all over. With each level completed, you help brave Sean on his adventurous journey.

So dive into Strongblade's colorful world today. It's not just a game; it's a thrilling adventure filled with fun, challenges, and delightful surprises around every corner.

2430940.name: Among Us VR - Hat Pack: Polus Point Picks
2430940.detailed_description:
We’ve arrived at Polus Point! To celebrate the launch of our new map, we’re excited to announce our first Among Us VR-exclusive DLC hat pack, Polus Point Picks — these 5 never-before-seen hats are the first designs specific to the VR game.

The Hat Pack: Polus Point Picks includes:
  • Brr-Bear-y
    Luxury imported textiles. A modern take on bean fashion.
  • PengYinz
    NOOT NOOT! The cutest headpiece you’ll ever wear.
  • Cap-tivating
    Just like Grandma used to make!
  • Royal Ice-ing
    Let it go into the unknown.
  • Breathe Gud
    You’ll have a gas in this hat!

Everything is brand new to keep you looking fresh in both Polus Point and Skeld II. Need more Among Us VR-exclusive hats? Don’t forget to check out our free ‘FREEzing Polus Point’ Hats in game. You’re going to lava them, beans!

Stay Suspicious.

2430910.name: Unknown FPV : Drone Simulator
2430910.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Playtest development phase is open!

  • Try out the Demo version of the game.
  • Head over to our Discord; we use that as our preferred communication platform for bugs and feature requests.


Notice

Unknown: FPV Drone Simulator requires a controller in order to play. Playing with a keyboard and mouse isn't supported.


About the Game

Welcome to Unknown FPV, an exhilarating first-person view (FPV) drone simulator that will take you on a thrilling ride through a ever-evolving stylized environment. Whether you're a seasoned pilot looking to hone your skills or a beginner eager to learn the art of flying, this simulator is the perfect training ground. Best of all, mastering the game will not only save you money but also equip you with the expertise to fly in real life.

Physics & Multiplayer
Unknown FPV's physics engine strives to replicate real-life dynamics but with a touch of arcade to make it more fun. And did we mention? Unknown FPV supports multiplayer, so you can challenge your friends and fellow pilots in exhilarating races and breathtaking stunts.

Exploration & Cinematics

In Unknown FPV you can chase cars along serpentine roads! Chase your friends in a dense forest dodging trees or venture across open landscape covered with breath taking grass.

Racing

Want to become one of the fastest pilots on this world? Unknown FPV features GP style racing course layouts so you can practice flying 6s style kamikaze drones!

Customization is fun but..
Customization is at the heart of Unknown FPV. You have the freedom to tweak the essential settings you'd typically adjust on your drone. Our team comprises seasoned FPV racing pilots, cinematic pilots, and freestyle pilots who have streamlined the customization process, eliminating unnecessary complexity and noise. Only the key settings remain, empowering you to spend less time in settings menu and more time flying.

We value your feedback
Our development team is fueled by the invaluable feedback and input of our community. We consider you, the player, an integral part of the development process, and that's why we're releasing the game in an early playtest phase. This approach allows us to focus on what truly matters and ensures that we build a game that resonates with you as a pilot.

What is left you might ask?
Well, join us on this journey to make FPV simulators great again. Together, we'll shape Unknown FPV into the ultimate playground for drone enthusiasts.
Get ready to push your limits, unlock your potential, and experience the pure joy of flying.

A very important notice!
You need a controller to play this game, PS4, Xbox will work, the best experience is achieved using a transmitter if you have one.
Support can only be offered in English. There is no menu support for controllers yet!

2430980.name: Staircase55: A SCP-087 Story
2430980.detailed_description:
Staircase 55 is an atmospheric psychological horror game that thrusts you into the heart of your deepest fears. Equipped only with a high-powered flashlight, you're sent to uncover the mysteries at the bottom of an ominous stairwell, if there even is a bottom...

Adaptive Horror Experience
Tuned to engage your most intimate fears and anxieties, the game intricately analyses your playstyle, subtly adjusting the AI behavior to heighten tension and dread.

Procedural Generation
Designed not primarily for replayability but for unpredictability, Staircase 55 ensures each descent into the stairwell is a unique and unnerving journey.

The Staircase
Within this anomaly, ordinary rules of space and reason cease to apply. SCP-087, as classified by the SCP Foundation, is an enigmatic and paradoxical construct. Nestled within an abandoned building once owned by C.G.J., this peculiar stairwell defies comprehension. In an effort to maintain control, the Foundation has established a perimeter around the entrance, attempting to contain its unexplained and disturbing influence.

Join the exploration of Staircase 55, where every step you take further plunges you into the haunting unknown.

Brace yourself - it's a long way down.

2431010.name: Medieval Kingdom Wars - Zombie Mode
2431010.detailed_description:
Zombie Mode completely transforms the combat gameplay of Medieval Kingdom Wars - both for online and multiplayer Skirmish and all the Campaign battle modes.

As a mysterious plague infects medieval Europe – the dead no longer stay dead. Every soldier who dies in battles by any reason will shortly rise as a gruesome Zombie - and will try to eat everyone around – friend or foe.

The only solutions are looting the fallen soldiers or burning their corpses with fire arrows.

This expansion requires player to start new campaign to activate the Zombie Mode feature, or a new Skirmish game and comes complete with new screens, high-res Zombie units, sound effects and main menu changes.

2430990.name: Their Land
2430990.detailed_description:
What is Their Land?

Their Land is a single player game developed by a single developer with focus on an exciting story. Additionally the game offers a wave-based coop mode which you can play with up to three people and compare your results on a global leaderboard.

Their Land was developed and produced by one individual. In the story-mode you can find artefacts with exciting nano-stories and explore the island. The story-mode lasts about 3 hours.

This Island should have never been found

The sea holds a secret that no one has dared to uncover – yet. A mysterious, unexplored island shrouded in mystery. It beckons to a group of intrepid adventurers, seasoned in the art of danger and the thrill of exploration.

Their mission: to uncover new riches of raw materials to fuel a burgeoning mining industry, and to scout potential sites for the construction of entire towns and cities on this untouched terrain. But what lies beneath the surface of this island and why has it never been entered?

... or left?

You are Jeremy, an inexperienced 19-year-old. The island’s secrets call to all fearless men, drawing them ever deeper into a world of danger. Will you uncover the hidden treasures of this fabled land, or will you fall victim to its many perils?

You Can’t Save Everyone. But You Can Try…

Their Land is a 1st person puzzle game and shooter with an exciting story. You will need to help your friends and survive on your own from never before seen creatures.

2430110.name: Sapiens Craft
2430110.detailed_description:
Sapiens is a crafting based management/idle colony simulator. You to start from small stone age band and grow through all of history.

You'll craft, research and manage your way through 8 ages: Stone, Bronze, Iron, Medieval, Exploration, Industrial, Modern and Future.

Explore over 300 unique crafts as you grow and advance.

Can you lead your workers to glory? Will you be a peaceful society or ruthless and pragmatic?

If you mange to survive and outpace your competition, you'll face a final challenge as a global government running a futuristic planet that is on the brink of extinction.

2430190.name: FlippedDream
2430190.detailed_description:
Introduction


FlippedDream is a physically-based, 3D-platformer and maze-exploring game, developed by Unreal Engine 4.

You will get into 14 different mazes, trying to find the exit through your exploration.

At the same time, you can change the direction of the global gravity to go into different channels or avoid obstacles.

When the gravity is rotating, your camera is rotating as well, causing the loss of your sense of directions.

And this would be your biggest challenge during the gameplay.

FlippedDream is my graduation project, developed on my own, for the first time. It is not perfect indeed, but hopes to become a part of your memories of video games.

Control


A/D: Move left/right.

Space: Jump.

Q/E：Rotate the global gravity clockwise/counter clockwise, 90 degrees for each time. You can not change it again until it finishes doing so.

Esc: Pause;

Levels


The game consists of 5 chapters and 14 levels. You will be faced of multiple obstacles too.



1. Simple gravity item

Some items' gravity directions would also change as the global gravity changes, but some would not. They have their unique gravity.



2. Single pendulum

Single pendulum is an anchor, connected to a "simple gravity item" by a cable.



3. Gravity converter

In charpter 3, the player would not be allowed to change gravity at any time, you can only change it when touching the "gravity converter".



4. The fan

The big fan would be continuesly rotating slowly, blocking the items when contacting them.



5. Diseased cells

Diseased cells and harmful to healthy ones. When a health cell contacts a diseased one, it would get illed and die. So make sure to avoid them in any case.

Additional notes


1. No solution

If an obstacle is stucked in a channel especially which would lead to the exit, you could consider loading the last check point. This would reload the whole level.

2. Adjusting resolution in fullscreen mode causes the app to flicker or stutter

Maybe it is because you have installed NVIDIA Game Ready Driver 461.09 or newer. You could find solutions in NVIDIA SUPPORT.

2430200.name: Hot Girls Delivery Club
2430200.detailed_description:
Adventures of the Silent Driver


The orange evening sun fell on the city, and a pleasant coolness was felt in the air. Everything was quiet and peaceful, except for the buzzing of the air conditioner in the car. Thoughts about the future were interrupted by a call. The message from Greta was standard. In a few hours it will be time for the driver to get behind the wheel of his car and head into the night city to rescue the girls from the dirty clutches of the mafia.

Syntwave rest

HGDC is a simple card puzzle with a plot for a couple of evenings in the company of a cool car, dangerous work and nice girls traveling companions. In the tasks you will be helped by fellow racers - the mysterious "White Angel", funny - "Blue Demon", and charming operator Greta. Based on partially real events ;)

From the fans of "Drive":

  • Turn-based card racing!
  • Beautiful girls drawn by hands.
  • Syntwave music.

Get behind the wheel, the girls are already waiting to be rescued!
2430200.about_the_game:
Adventures of the Silent Driver


The orange evening sun fell on the city, and a pleasant coolness was felt in the air. Everything was quiet and peaceful, except for the buzzing of the air conditioner in the car. Thoughts about the future were interrupted by a call. The message from Greta was standard. In a few hours it will be time for the driver to get behind the wheel of his car and head into the night city to rescue the girls from the dirty clutches of the mafia.

Syntwave rest

HGDC is a simple card puzzle with a plot for a couple of evenings in the company of a cool car, dangerous work and nice girls traveling companions. In the tasks you will be helped by fellow racers - the mysterious "White Angel", funny - "Blue Demon", and charming operator Greta. Based on partially real events ;)

From the fans of "Drive":

  • Turn-based card racing!
  • Beautiful girls drawn by hands.
  • Syntwave music.

Get behind the wheel, the girls are already waiting to be rescued!
2430200.short_description: A silent driver rescues girls from human trafficking. Can he and his operator Greta overcome the main enemy, and find themselves?

2430220.name: CATASS
2430220.detailed_description:
CATASS is a game where you are a cat! Never let your human realize your feline plans. THROW THINGS! And many other important plans, of course. I mean... Meow.

Complete the main storyline to declare yourself a supreme cat and show your human who's in charge. CATASS is a casual game where you can demonstrate your worth as a cat through different levels and extra challenges.

An adventure filled with exciting levels, puzzles, riddles, humor, references to pop culture, and the internet.
Complete all the achievements to become the greatest cat of all time and crown yourself as the master and supreme ruler of CATASS.

CATASS is a personal project developed solo and made in my free time on weekends. And to provide a fun and exciting experience. This project is to prove myself by developing a solo game from scratch: Game design, graphics, logic, music, and animations. I've made everything except the sound effects and typography I bought in Envato Elements.

If you play the game, I beg your pardon because of all the bugs. I'm not a programmer and an absolute noob developing. Surprisingly, many great people have finished the game, streamers, VTubers, and amazing gamers around the globe. The game works. IT WORKS! I really don't know how, but it works!

Download CATASS now and experience the thrill of being a cat. You won't regret it!

2430310.name: Mighty Marbles
2430310.detailed_description:
Welcome to Mighty Marbles, a cute physics based game where you control the level to guide the marble to victory. Inspired by the desire to see real life physics toys as a video game!

CONTROLS

Each level is a playground of diverse puzzles, each with its own unique set of controls. Fear not; an intuitive on-screen controller showcases how to navigate each puzzle, granting you the freedom to switch between challenges at your whim!

PUZZLES

Prepare for a series of interconnected puzzles in every level, each presenting distinct challenges that put your mastery of physics to the test. Losing your marble leads to a swift rescue thanks to the adorable Bobby Copters, getting you back in the action quickly.

CAMERA

Tailor your gaming experience to your liking: opt for the close-up camera, immersing yourself in a detailed view of the puzzle, or switch to the bird's eye perspective for a comprehensive overview of the entire level. Can't settle on one? No problem! Switch effortlessly between the two views with a simple button press, ensuring you have the perfect perspective for every moment.

COURSES

The levels are organized into courses. Each course has 9 levels sharing the same theme with new puzzles introduced each level. Initially for early access there are 3 courses, toybox, machines and mini golf. Additionally each course can be played with different game modes to explore new and challenging ways to play.

COLLECT

No marble game is complete without the joy of collecting marbles! Completing fast times on each course and each mode will unlock new and exciting marbles. Once collected, these marbles become yours to choose from, allowing you to personalize your experience by selecting any of your acquired marbles before embarking on a course.

COMMUNITY

Mighty Marbles is a game made from a passion to see physics toys as a video game by a solo developer from Australia. Your feedback, advice, or a simple hello are always welcomed in my Discord community! Join anytime to share your thoughts, offer suggestions, or just to connect and be part of the journey!

2430250.name: VerdantOfWorld:LostWay
2430250.detailed_description:
This is a placement game, does not require much operation, just put that occasionally look to click on it.
The game has a little bit of strategy, you can add attributes according to your own preferences.
At the same time, you can always adjust the equipment properties, to carry out a variety of combinations.
The extra material resources produced by placing it for a long time can also be exchanged for a permanent increase in attributes.

Explore the ruins, challenge the limits of survival; find the unknown, brave breakthrough
When free, manually engage in battle for extra resources and unknown abilities

Whisper it, if you don't mind the trouble, when you start a new game, you can open the mystery box repeatedly by deleting and creating a new archive until you get the materials you need

2430300.name: Hauma - A Detective Noir Story - Prologue
2430300.detailed_description:
ABOUT HAUMA

Hauma is a noir deduction visual novel set in the heart of Munich. Step into the shoes of Judith, a former detective with a sharp wit and a knack for getting things done, as she uncovers a conspiracy amongst the city's upper echelons of society. Explore real locations in a unique art style, immersing you in the world of Bavaria's capital. From the historic House of Art to other unexpected locations, discover pieces of hidden history that shed light on the city's past.

Collect items, solve puzzles, and overcome dialogue riddles as you make your own investigative deductions using the mindboard, the heart of the game which functions like an inventory containing items and thoughts.

Featuring a diverse cast, Hauma is a fully voiced cinematic adventure with an intriguing story. Embark on a journey of deduction and intrigue, uncover the secrets of Munich's society and piece together the puzzle of the conspiracy that lies within.

  • [❖] A thrilling noir-inspired journey through Munich

  • [❖] The mindboard, an innovative inventory of interconnected items and thoughts

  • [❖] Engaging investigation mechanics, including a variety of puzzles and challenging dialogue riddles

  • [❖] A visually unique art style

  • [❖] Fully voiced cinematic adventure, featuring a diverse cast

2430260.detailed_description:
Welcome to Pure Fun VR! An immersive NSFW adult VR game. Meet Nina and her sister Brandy, they both share a secret. They like it when you watch them while they play.

Invite Nina or Brandy or both into any of the three non-judgmental scenes and explore your most intimate desires. Touch them, move them, pose them.

The game has been designed to keep your hands free. Move the sisters in any desired pose or use the preset posses as an easy starting point. Let them play
together or place them onto of you.

With the easy recording functionality you can set a start and stop position for the body, hands and feet and animate the sisters to do whatever you want.

Slide into their VR world and enjoy the following features:

  • Both have their own sets of toys which are animated while your hands are occupied with more important bits.
  • Body fluids added in latest version. Use your right controller trigger to paint them white.
  • Grab the hand feet or waist to move them into any desired position.

2430370.name: Striker Zone: Gun Games Online
2430370.detailed_description:
Step into the thrilling world of Striker Zone – a cross-platform shooter game where heroism meets the heat of battle. Engage in heart-pounding warfare with soldiers from around the globe, each moment packed with adrenaline and the echo of gunfire.



In Striker Zone, you are more than a soldier; you're a modern warrior, a hero poised to strike in the zone where war never ends. Your arsenal? A range of free, state-of-the-art weapons at your fingertips. Every battle is a chance to rewrite history in this world of constant war, where your army comrades become your brethren in arms.



Battlefields come to life with the sound of shooting and the rush of survival instincts. Attack is more than a strategy; it's your second nature, honed to perfection in the zone where only the strongest persist. And as the gun smoke clears, will you stand as the ultimate survivor?



The game's essence is warfare, but the experience is pure adrenaline. Striker Zone offers a free PvP environment that challenges your shooter instincts at every turn. Each battle, each skirmish, each silent takedown could tip the scales in this relentless world war.

With every fight, you climb the ranks of the army elite, proving your mettle as a soldier, hero, and legend of the Striker Zone. Your weapon is not just a gun; it's an extension of your will, modern machinery of warfare that brings the concept of attack to a whole new level.

So, prepare to immerse yourself in Striker Zone, where the action never stops and the next battle is just a heartbeat away. Will you answer the call of duty and become the hero this world needs?

2430380.name: War Gun: Shooting Games Online
2430380.detailed_description:
Join War Gun, an exciting shooter that will give you unforgettable moments on the battlefield! Go into the world of war and become an irresistible warrior, ready to face any challenges.


War Gun is a story about brave heroes and exciting battles. You will have to fight in epic online battles in which every shot and every decision matters. Choose your side and join the battle full of adrenaline and dynamics.

From the moment the game starts, you will plunge into the incredibly realistic world of armed conflict. Stunning graphics and high-quality visual effects will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of war. The environment comes to life before your eyes, creating the illusion of presence on the battlefield.


The game offers you endless opportunities for strategic thinking and tactical reasoning. A variety of game modes and maps will allow you to choose the perfect battlefield for your style of play. Whether it's stormy street battles or a clever operation in the snowy mountains, armed conflict will provide you with an unforgettable experience.


A huge selection of weapons and equipment will allow you to customize your character and create unique battle tactics. From powerful assault rifles to deadly sniper rifles, you will be able to choose what is right for you. Gradually unlock new items and upgrade your weapons to become a real military expert.

War Gun also offers an exciting multiplayer mode that allows you to challenge players from all over the world. Join a team with your comrades in arms and apply your skills and tactical thinking to achieve victory.

2430390.name: DYSPLACED
2430390.detailed_description:
Catapulted from your mundane reality into a realm facing apocalypse, you enter a world on the brink of destruction. Here, survival is paramount, requiring resourcefulness in gathering, building, and crafting amidst chaos. Your latent abilities are key, not just for survival, but for thriving and combating the darkness that hastens the world's end. This is an adventure of mastery and discovery in a land desperate for a savior to unveil its secrets and fend off the looming catastrophe.



  • 🧭 Explore a vast world of beauty - and darkness
  • 🏕️ Construct campsites, fortifications, and settlements
  • ⚒️ Gather and utilize resources to forge your path forward
  • 🗡️ Craft equipment and create custom weapons from pieces
  • 🛡️ Create your hero from scratch
  • 🧙 Master the art of sorcery by tapping into arcane energies
  • 🩸 Concoct potions to achieve a tactical upper hand
  • 🦞 Cook mouth-watering meals for extra vigor and other boons
  • 🧛‍♂️ Fight against the shadowy force menacing your new home
  • 🎣 Fish at the murky forgotten lakes of the world for a mysterious catch
  • 🐝 Catch a variety of critters for use in crafting or just for a collection







You find yourself lost in a fantastical realm with no way back. Learn the lay of the land and the rules governing this strange place. Once you know where and what to look for, you can harness nearly everything you find to help you become the champion of your wildest dreams. Outfit your chosen hero with bespoke weapons and mystic armor hammered out from the resources of this strange world. Choose between aesthetics that would bewitch even the nobles or practical efficiency that would impress a blacksmith - the choice lies in your hands!



Unleash your creativity with the Modular Weapons System: Combine blades and handles to craft unique weapons with the characteristics you desire.





Make a camp, build a perimeter, expand it, build a house, build a forge - create a new home! You'll venture further into the expansive world by building camp sites and larger outposts along the way. Having a well equipped base can make all the difference when facing the challenges of this new fantastic frontier.





After equipping yourself for the journey, a vast and enchanting universe awaits you. Delve into its abundant resources unearth hidden treasures, witness awe-inspiring wonders, brave treacherous perils, and unlock mysterious enigmas. Forge your domain by establishing camps, fortifications, and even prosperous settlements, expanding your influence across the realm.





In your new life you will also uncover your hidden skills in arcana - the sublime enchantment that breathes life into your newfound realm. The applications of arcana are many: Gathering, building, fighting, protecting and so on. It may be through magic that you finally find your way back home - should you so desire.





Beneath the tranquil facade, a sinister force is consuming the realm, spreading chaos, and driving the people into exile. Are you ready to steel yourself against the threat devouring these lands? It could be your destiny to steer this world clear of its impending doom...





You can conquer this strange new world alone - or you can bring a friend. Dysplaced allows you to bring along another dysplaced being for a shared experience in the dream-infused world where you will find both tranquility and excitement.
2430390.about_the_game:
Catapulted from your mundane reality into a realm facing apocalypse, you enter a world on the brink of destruction. Here, survival is paramount, requiring resourcefulness in gathering, building, and crafting amidst chaos. Your latent abilities are key, not just for survival, but for thriving and combating the darkness that hastens the world's end. This is an adventure of mastery and discovery in a land desperate for a savior to unveil its secrets and fend off the looming catastrophe.



  • 🧭 Explore a vast world of beauty - and darkness
  • 🏕️ Construct campsites, fortifications, and settlements
  • ⚒️ Gather and utilize resources to forge your path forward
  • 🗡️ Craft equipment and create custom weapons from pieces
  • 🛡️ Create your hero from scratch
  • 🧙 Master the art of sorcery by tapping into arcane energies
  • 🩸 Concoct potions to achieve a tactical upper hand
  • 🦞 Cook mouth-watering meals for extra vigor and other boons
  • 🧛‍♂️ Fight against the shadowy force menacing your new home
  • 🎣 Fish at the murky forgotten lakes of the world for a mysterious catch
  • 🐝 Catch a variety of critters for use in crafting or just for a collection

2430400.name: Gunfire Reborn - Artisan and Magician
2430400.detailed_description:
Artisan and Magician are coming on stage!

  • Two new heroes will join your adventure. You can choose to either strategically command the power of the star cardor summon a mecha to fight alongside you. At the same time, they also bring four new weapons, including a submachine gun, a compass, an squid, and... a brick that conceals subtle golden sheen.

2 New Heros

  • Zi Xiao: He can use the quality of occult scrolls to divine the astrological aspects. The color of the astrological aspects would affect the power of the cards. When all colors in the astrological aspects are the same, it can enhance the attack of the stars against enemies.


  • Nona: Fight alongside with self-crafted wooden mecha. The mecha can both charge into battle to draw enemy fire and defend a position while providing powerful fire support.

4 New Weapons

  • Brick: Beneath its simple and unassuming appearance lies the starlight that drops when you hit enemies' weak point.It can only reveal its true power once you pick it up.


  • Jet Octopus: Absorb the water vapor from enemies and convert it into it's own energy,then exhale a powerful high-pressure water column to attack enemies.


  • Wolf Gaze: Shooting or weapon skills will stack different statuses and trigger high damage or range scatter when it is at max stacks.


  • Star Ring: Gain the power of the stars surrounding yourself in a circle and tear enemies within the expanding and contracting of stars.

About Gunfire Reborn:

  • Gunfire Reborn is an adventure level-based game featuring FPS, roguelite, and RPG elements. You could play as different heroes with their own unique abilities. In each game, the build can be different with the random drop and route. You could enjoy the Gunfire Reborn by yourself in solo play, or join a 4-player co-op.
  • In each run, the stage route can be different, and every new game means a different experience. You could choose between various ascensions, weapons and have various combat strategies for each situation.

2430440.name: Time Raiders
2430440.detailed_description:
Delve deep and explore the vast eastern undergrounds.
Treasures? Monsters? Who knows what awaits you...

[Create all types of new equipment]
The best equipment determines whether you win or lose. What kind of weapon will you rely on?

[Experience a deep, intriguing story]
Mysterious undead dens, dangerous blood zombie catacombs, there are endless new places to explore.

[Discover historical treasures]
Discover buried treasures, use your unique sight to authenticate them, and battle against the undead.

[Team up with allies to defeat bosses]
Gather a trustworthy team and battle against all types of undead creatures and ghosts.

[Have no regrets!]
Say goodbye to the games where you can't change classes! You can start off as an unstoppable martial fighter and change into a gunslinger, or even a mage!

[Customize your vehicles]
You'll need a vehicle to travel across the world, and what better is there than to customize your ride? Travel to ancient catacombs in style!

2430460.name: Stray Blade – Valley of Strays
2430460.detailed_description:
Six months have passed after Farren and Boji’s last adventure in Stray Blade.

Join both in the next chapter and protect Acrea from a new enemy which threatens to take over the long-forgotten land.

Key Features
  • A new journey: Learn more about what has become of Farren and Boji in the time that has passed.
  • Return to the Wastelands: Experience the return to the Seething Wastelands in a new way.
  • Prepare: Discover new and powerful armor (helmet, shoulder pads and chest plate), all infused with the Acrean elements, granting extraordinary strong protection and energy efficiency.
  • New Enemies: Encounter humanoid enemies which deserted from their factions as well as tamed creatures which now fight alongside the humans.
  • The Final Boss: Prove yourself once again in one new epic boss fight against Knox, a former member of the Golden Order.

2430430.name: Dicefolk Demo
2430430.detailed_description:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Dicefolk_Join_Our_Discord_600x224.png[/img][/url]

Dicefolk brings a unique tactical roguelite based on monster-catching mechanics for Roguelite players, but only Dicefolk gives you control of the dice and enemy turns!







You'll embark on a thrilling adventure to collect and recruit new chimeras for your squad. In this demo you get access to the first talisman and play the first map of a run to start uncovering the real truth behind the chimeras, and develop new tactics with each run. With different chimeras come different strategies, ensuring endless replayability.




Dicefolk puts you in the driver's seat when it comes to the action. You decide the faces of the dice, giving you unprecedented influence over your chimeras' abilities and attacks. It's all up to you, and your tactical choices will determine your success in battle.




With a variety of different chimeras to recruit and command, you'll need to strategize and adapt your playstyle to suit each battle. From tough tanks to speedy attackers, each chimera brings a unique set of abilities to the table. Build the perfect squad and hone your tactical skills!

2430470.name: Vilde
2430470.detailed_description:
VILDE: a Norse Saga


Embark on an epic journey through the realm of Norse mythology in Vilde, a roguelite first-person shooter where you must conquer your past and face your darkest self.

Weapons — wield powerful weapons inspired by Norse legends, blending ancient weapons with futuristic technology. Unleash devastating lightning bolts from a machine gun or rain down explosive frost shards from a rocket launcher.



Ability Cores — discover and equip mystical cores that grant you potent active and passive abilities. Customize your warrior to suit your playstyle, and adapt to the ever-changing challenges ahead



Rising Challenge —with each victory over the final boss, the game's difficulty escalates, ensuring that each playthrough remains a fresh and challenging experience.

Persistent Progress — use the currency amassed in previous runs to permanently enhance your character at the start of the game. Boost your health, refine your weapons, and strengthen your abilities to face the growing darkness.

Singleplayer or Coop — face the trials of Vilde alone or with a friend in co-op mode. Overcome the forces of darkness together and save the realms from utter destruction.

Procedurally Generated Realms — venture through procedurally generated levels, each with a unique Norse mythology-inspired theme. Tackle a mix of combat challenges and cunning traps, testing your skills and wits at every turn.

Epic Visuals — delve into a vivid and epic art style inspired by Norse mythology and Viking culture. Encounter a diverse cast of characters, set against breathtaking landscapes and ancient ruins.



In a world steeped in myth and legend, a lone warrior must face her darkest fears and confront the corrupted version of herself that seeks ultimate power. Will you rise above the darkness and restore balance to the realms? Embark on the epic saga of Vilde and find out.

2430500.name: Delven
2430500.detailed_description:
Embark on an epic journey in Delven, the thrilling strategy game that combines exploration, base building, and the hunt for extraordinary loot! Immerse yourself in a world where strategy, RPG, and idle game elements meld seamlessly to create an addictive and unique gaming experience.

EXPLORE AND BUILD YOUR BASE

Adventure awaits beneath the surface! Dive deep into the unknown to unearth diverse biomes, exotic plants, and precious minerals. Expand your domain, hire diligent workers, and master the art of automated crafting. Higher-level workers can control multiple areas, so make sure your Tetris skills are up to date!

FIGHT MONSTERS

Train fearless mercenaries, vanquish terrifying monsters, and collect randomly generated weapons and armor! The auto-battle option is perfect for eliminating hordes of regular monsters, while manual controls are required to defeat tougher foes and bosses.

CHOOSE YOUR OWN PACE

In Delven, you can either speed through challenges or take your time to explore the world. Battles are turn-based, so you can always take a break if needed.

And the best part? Your progress never stops! Delven features offline progress, ensuring that crafting continues even when you're away or your computer is shut down.

Interested in conquering the depths? Add Delven to your wishlist and stay updated on all the latest developments!

2430510.name: Pyramid Curse
2430510.detailed_description:
Pyramid Curse: A Found Footage Horror Adventure

Pyramid Curse is an analog found footage style horror that will make you feel like a real explorer of a mysterious underground inverted pyramid. You will plunge into a sinister atmosphere full of body horror, unexpected twists and shocking discoveries. In the game you will learn the stories of different characters, who in their own way faced the curse of the pyramid: scientists working for a mysterious organization, a journalist who wants fame and an unfortunate guy who decided to spend the night in the woods. Each of them will give you a different perspective on what's going on and make you wonder what really happened there. Pyramid Curse is an atmospheric short story for fans of analog body horror.
