2430540.name: Radix Chronicle
2430540.detailed_description:
Finally, a tactical RPG that has NO RNG to Hit, Miss, or Crit!




When you attack, use an item, cast a spell, or defend yourself, you'll face a Ring Trial. Click when the indicator is in the Blue Zone to succeed. Click when the indicator is in the Red Zone for a critical success! But, of course, try not to miss...

A living battlefield to change as you please!




Terrain has a massive impact on battles. Fortunately, you can change it freely with your magic! Just beware... your foes can do the same!

A story that changes based on how you fight!


Actions speak louder than words. There's no dialogue trees of conveniently delineated options for you here... how your characters interact depends on how you fight. Story scenes branch frequently, and early game events are built upon later. Your decisions (and your skill) will determine your party's fate—in more ways than one!

The party that never stops!


When the new king sent princess Sahana to the far-flung hinterlands of the kingdom via a "political marriage" to a provincial governor, she didn't expect a warm welcome. And that's great, because she didn't get one!

Her reluctant husband, Kadi, treats her well but mostly avoids her. He spends his days doing "research" in the woods. Vexingly, that research seems to involve a beautiful mercenary named Celestora—who says she wants Kadi dead, but spends all her time with him anyway. Hana's "exile" isn't the worst, but she has had about enough of this little situation...

Join this band of misfits as they journey into the wilds, both to quell monsters that trouble the province and for Kadi's... "research."

2430540.short_description: Radix is a tactical RPG inspired by SNES and early Playstation classics. With dark themes but bright characters, this fantasy tale changes depending on how you fight! Your magic can even alter the land itself. Use your timing and skill, rather than your luck, to lead your party home safely each day!

2429620.name: Typing Bullets
2429620.detailed_description:
Typing Bullets is an endless typing action game, where you move and shoot by typing the key you are on. Each new word you jump on will also shows you its definition. So you can improve your vocabulary and get better at typing at the same time. Fight enemies based on keyboard keys, collect upgrade points to customize your playthroughs and get a high score! If this sounds like something you would like, give the game a try. I hope you like it.



Features


  • Fight unique enemies, all based on keyboard keys, like the Shift enemy that will rotate the platforms; the Control enemy that shoots bullets at you; the Pause enemy that creates an area that slows your bullets down; and many others.
  • Use different weapons: from homing missiles, to lasers, shotguns and even a lightning gun.
  • Fun respawn mechanic: when your HP reaches zero, a quiz will appear with the words you have typed during your current run. Answer correctly and you can continue your playthrough.
  • Customize your runs with over 500 upgrades. From increasing your total ammo count, to adding more seconds to the death quiz timer, the upgrade system lets you experience Typing Bullets the way you want.
  • Activate slow motion and make use of special haste areas to increase your fighting capabilities.
  • Practice your typing skills and learn new words with a word list of tens of thousands of words.



NOTES


A very important note on the words that may appear in the game: games should be enjoyed by everybody, and so I did my best to remove all the bad and hateful words that I could find. I am aware that I might have missed some, so if you do find words that fit that criteria, such as words that are misogynistic, racist, xenophobic, transphobic, homophobic, offensive to ethnicities or offensive to religions, or in any other way affect you emotionally or trigger emotional trauma, please let me know and I will do my best to remove these words and their definitions as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.



Credits


  • Made with LÖVE.
  • Word list and definitions: Simple English Dictionary, by nightblade9, from GitHub (MIT License)
  • Font used: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen
  • Keyboard sounds: "Type" by Shapeforms Audio
  • Trailer song: "Canon in D chill arrange" by syncopika (from OpenGameArt) (CC0)

2429630.name: AI.Cybercraft
2429630.detailed_description:
THIS GAME OFFERS THREE IMMERSIVE MODES: SPACHESHIPS BATTLES, TOWER DEFENSE, & FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER
- 39 Levels of Spaceships battles
- 10 Levels of Tower Defense
- 7 Levels of Battles against AI Bosses
- 3 Levels of Endless Space Battles



Prepare for high-stakes Spaceship Battles where strategy meets adrenaline-pumping action. Throughout the campaign, unlock a diverse array of spacecraft to navigate cosmic conflicts. Each mission pits you against relentless waves of enemies—from AI robots and drones to formidable mini-Bosses and epic end-level Bosses.


Each vessel boasts unique attributes and customizable load-outs, allowing you to tailor your approach to the battles at hand. Before each mission, meticulous planning in the lobby involves purchasing and upgrading tactical missiles, destructive warheads, squad reinforcements, Super weapons, Health boosts, Shields, and more. Mastering these tools is key to navigating the chaos, outmaneuvering foes, and emerging triumphant in the thrilling expanse of space combat.


Steam Achievements
Test your mettle and prove your mastery in AI.Cybercraft through an array of Steam Achievements. From conquering challenging missions to unlocking hidden story segments, these achievements provide an additional layer of motivation. Showcase your dedication as a defender of Ulara and a beacon of hope for humanity.


THE STORY
"AI.Cybercraft" thrusts players into a gripping futuristic scenario where humanity fights for survival against invading AI robots that decimated Earth in 2068. As battles spill into the galaxies, humans stake their claim on new planets like Ulara, seeking refuge and a chance to strike back.




Engage in Tower Defense Mode, where your critical task is to fortify defenses by tactically placing an array of ground and air defenses. The relentless AI adversaries launch calculated assaults from strategic points encircling your base, requiring astute management of defenses while safeguarding key elements: energy reserves, technological advancements, and the central machine gun tower - the linchpin of your defense strategy.


the dynamic battlefield demands swift action. When the situation escalates, seamlessly transition to a first-person perspective. As you switch to FPS mode, assume the frontline defender role, wielding the potent Machine Gun Tower. Your accuracy and reflexes become pivotal in repelling successive enemy waves and preventing breaches that could compromise your mission or base integrity.



In the adrenaline-fueled First-Person Shooter mode, you're the critical support for your defenses under siege. Operating the potent machine gun emplacement at your base's core, your task is to fend off relentless assaults.


Alongside the machine gun, an anti-air guided missile system stands ready to intercept drones and stray satellites hurtling towards your stronghold. Your precision and speed are paramount as you thwart aerial threats and prevent breaches that could jeopardize your mission.


Amidst the chaos, the Tech Center sends crucial drops containing ammunition and raw materials. Your sharpshooting skills come into play as you shoot down these supplies, securing resources vital for maintaining your defense. Balancing offense with defense, your role as the frontline defender is pivotal.

Throughout the game, players experience thrilling combat, delve into strategic planning, and engage in high-stakes battles against powerful AI adversaries. With its diverse modes and challenging gameplay, "AI.Cybercraft" offers an immersive and adrenaline-pumping experience set in a captivating futuristic universe.

2429720.name: Effugium
2429720.detailed_description:
"Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds." - J. Robert Oppenheimer

Effugium is a first-person exploratory horror walking simulator with a heavy emphasis on atmosphere and immersion.

Key Features:
  • Navigate and search for a means for escape as you explore the cold and empty space facility.
  • Immerse yourselves in the atmospheric sounds and world of Effugium!
  • Uncover and piece together the mystery of the space facility.

Effugium was developed by Team Glasses, a team of two students from USC Games in collaboration with the Berklee College of Music.

Playtime is approximately 6-10 minutes.

It is recommended to use headphones and an external mouse for the best possible experience of Effugium!

2429710.name: 神经联结(Neural Nexus)
2429710.detailed_description:
The Neural Connection Company has created a strong artificial intelligence, but due to some unknown reasons, the artificial intelligence suddenly got out of control. As an employee of the Neural Connection Company, you need to destroy the company's server equipment that stores the artificial intelligence network model to save the AI ​​from being out of control. At the same time, the reason behind the loss of control of AI was discovered...

It is a classic shooting game, but at the same time you can also summon drones and turrets to fight for you. We also advocate this approach, because guns alone cannot stop the AI ​​army.

In this game you can:
1. Use a variety of firearms to shoot
2. Use tower defense for defense
3. Summon drones for coordinated operations
4. Use an airbrush to paint on the wall

The main style is similar to a vampire hunter, many monsters charge, and you are responsible for surviving.

There is no music in this game, because the author can't compose and write lyrics.

2429750.name: Hooked
2429750.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game



In a world consumed by technology and the fast pace of modern life, it's easy to lose sight of the simple things that make life worth living. But for those who seek a simpler existence, there is a quaint town nestled in the heart of nature - Rosewood. With nothing but a small patch of land, a humble abode, and a burning passion for fishing, you set out to build a thriving business that will not only sustain you but also benefit the entire community in this quiet corner of the world, which seems full of opportunities.



As you leave behind the bright lights of the city and arrive in Rosewood, you'll quickly realize that there's more to this peaceful town than meets the eye. Explore the beautiful surroundings, from the serene pond near your cabin to the sleepy town, the mysterious forest, the glistening beach, and more.



Each place holds exciting new opportunities, and as you progress, you'll meet fascinating characters, each with their own stories and personalities. From the grizzled old-timer who knows all the best spots to the wide-eyed rookie who just wants to catch their first fish, everyone has a story to tell and secrets for you to uncover. You'll be able to build lasting relationships, trade goods, share experiences, and even fall in love. Some will become lifelong friends, while others will challenge you in unexpected ways.



As the seasons change, you'll need to adapt to the weather and conditions, honing your skills along the way. You'll have the chance to grow crops, raise animals, venture out to sea, and build a successful enterprise that rivals even the biggest corporations in the city. But the path ahead is not straight and narrow - it's filled with twists and turns that will keep you engaged and on your toes. Making the right decisions and managing your resources is up to you, and it's what will ultimately determine your success.

So cast your line, reel in your catch, and get ready to feel the tug on your line and the thrill of the catch - you're about to get "Hooked".





Features

  • Fishing:

    Experience the joy of angling as you master the art of catching fish in serene lakes and venturing out to the open sea for bigger challenges and rewards.

  • Animal Husbandry:

    Embrace the rural lifestyle by raising a variety of animals. Care for them, feed them, and witness their growth. From chickens and cows to sheep and pigs, nurture your livestock and benefit from their produce.

  • Cultivate Fields and Grow Crops:

    Become a skilled farmer by planting and tending to crops through changing seasons. Harvest your crops and reap the rewards.

  • Explore the depths:

    Venture underground and discover valuable resources hidden beneath the surface. Engage in mining activities and gather materials for crafting, building, and trading.

  • Become part of the local community:

    Interact with a diverse cast of intriguing characters who inhabit Rosewood. Form connections, trade goods, share experiences, and perhaps even find love along the way.

  • Crafting and Building:

    Utilize collected resources to craft useful tools, equipment, and items to aid your daily activities.

  • Cook Delicious Meals:

    Experiment with recipes using your fresh catches and homegrown ingredients to create tasty dishes.

  • Build Factories:

    Establish and expand your own fish factories to process and sell your catches, becoming a leading player in the industry.

  • Improve your skills over time:

    Enhance your fishing, farming, cooking, and crafting abilities as you gain experience. Unlock new abilities and advanced tools.

  • Experience the changing seasons:

    Witness the ever-changing beauty of Rosewood as each season brings its own charm and challenges.

  • Complete Quests:

    Engage in captivating quests that challenge your abilities and impact the town and its residents.

  • Character Customization:

    Personalize your in-game avatar with a wide range of clothing options, accessories, and hairstyles. Express your unique style and make your mark on the world of Rosewood.
2429750.about_the_game:
In a world consumed by technology and the fast pace of modern life, it's easy to lose sight of the simple things that make life worth living. But for those who seek a simpler existence, there is a quaint town nestled in the heart of nature - Rosewood. With nothing but a small patch of land, a humble abode, and a burning passion for fishing, you set out to build a thriving business that will not only sustain you but also benefit the entire community in this quiet corner of the world, which seems full of opportunities.



As you leave behind the bright lights of the city and arrive in Rosewood, you'll quickly realize that there's more to this peaceful town than meets the eye. Explore the beautiful surroundings, from the serene pond near your cabin to the sleepy town, the mysterious forest, the glistening beach, and more.

2429760.name: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection!
2429760.detailed_description:
JOHNNY ROCKETFINGERS 1 & 2, GAME COLLECTION!!

The internet smash hit Point & Click Adventure game, "Johnny Rocketfingers," is finally available to play directly from your desktop computer!

With over 50 million+ plays world wide this viral Stick Figure flash game won the hearts of everyone who played it on Newgrounds back during it's debut in 2003!

Enjoy replaying this classic series or playing for the first time!

In this adventure game series you control the character of Johnny Rocketfingers. Move your cursor carefully around environments to walk through and explore your surroundings. Click on items you find on-screen to pick them up. These items go in your inventory for the use of solving in-game puzzles. Talk to characters to get clues for what to do next on your missions. This is your standard Point & Click Puzzle Adventure game but with a violent, gritty, Tarantino-esque twist - inspired by Monkey Island, Lucasarts and Sierra games of the 90's. Also inspired by films such as Pulp Fiction, Goodfellas and Menace II Society.

WARNING: This game series is not recommended for young audiences or sensitive players. Contains extremely Crude Humor, Violence, Vulgar Language, Sexual Innuendos. Depictions of sexual acts and extreme violence. Depictions of drug and alcohol abuse.

2429880.name: Crystal Tales Tactics: Echoes of the Libertas War Demo
2429880.detailed_description:
Harem, Otome, Boys Love, Yaoi, Bara, Gay, Lesbian, Transgender, Amare, Dating Sims, B+B, G+G, B+G




  • Date system with 14 unique characters;
  • Unique scenes for your date;

  • Character creation with class and magical element customization;
  • Characters with unique classes and skills;
  • More than 90 characters to join your team;

  • Classic Mode for advanced players and Story Mode for those who want to focus on the narrative;
  • Skill improvements based on the level of relationship with the characters;
  • Random battles with different formations real-time created;
  • More than 12 hours of gameplay;
  • Unique Maps;


The continent of Libertas faces a threat: the Empire of Aeterna. Military and powerful, each day it annihilates the nearby kingdoms, destroying their cultures and taking over them. One by one, the kingdoms fell until the ones who weren't dominated decided to group themselves and fight back under the banner of the Libertasians Alliance. Angered by the group's attitude, the great Emperor Eligius Emeritus IV now seeks to find the 6 magic crystals created by the Goddess Vitalia to control the terrible serpent Obitus and force the entire world to bow down to him.

2429810.name: The Hauntings: Dark Passenger
2429810.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the enigmatic journey of Alex Mercer, as he navigates a reality that grows increasingly distant from the world he once knew. "The Hauntings: Dark Passenger" whisks players away on an intense voyage through dimensions where the boundaries of nightmare and reality blur into one.

Features:

Evolving Environments: Venture through ever-changing landscapes, from hauntingly quiet villages to the eerie silence of forgotten places. Each setting brings with it new challenges and atmospheric terrors.

Hidden Adversaries: Danger lurks in the most unexpected corners. Though some threats may remain unseen, their presence is always felt. Can you stay ahead of the lurking darkness?

Cryptic Puzzles:Delve into intricate challenges that stand between Alex and the truth. As you unravel each riddle, you'll piece together fragments of memories and unlock the mysteries of each realm.

A Story Unraveling: Engage in dialogues riddled with ambiguity and unmask the shadows that toy with Alex's sanity, as the true nature of the 'Dark Passenger' slowly comes into focus.

Twists Around Every Corner: Just when you believe the enigma is unraveled, new layers of intrigue pull you further into the depths of the unknown.

Plunge into "The Hauntings: Dark Passenger" and brace yourself for a psychological adventure where every step brings you closer to the heart of darkness. Will you shed light on the truth or be consumed by the shadows?

2429890.name: Incubus Quest
2429890.detailed_description:
A war between succubi and incubi has been raging for years in Lugrand, and Shadow was unluckily born as the weakest incubus there ever was.
When the succubi launch a surprise attack and capture or wipe out nearly the entire incubus population, Shadow makes it out thanks to a mysterious power he awakened to. But since he's the weakest, it's decided that he needs to train against humans before taking on the succubi. He teleports to Ardia, a different world where he'll gather experience and maybe make an ally or two. The problem is, he's so weak as an incubus he risks defeat even at the hand of humans...

Explore Ardia and grow stronger before returning to Lugrand to mount a resistance and launch a counterattack against the succubi and their army!


Learn to handle yourself and your foes through many battles. You're weak, but that doesn't mean you're powerless! Battles are as much a conversation as a fight, and you must control the ebb and flow to come out on top by using different skills depending on your current foe's inclinations. Pick your fights based on your current strengths and overcome every roadblock.

Many foes await you, but the world of Ardia has many weaker targets spread across its wilderness areas and the three main cities. Being defeated isn't a problem thanks to your newly awakened power, but actually defeating the enemy may be another matter entirely. Battle as many people as you can and grow stronger before returning to Alvarez to take the fight to the succubi!






Dozens of unique foes
On the road to becoming stronger, you'll face dozens of named humans and succubi alike. Each has a different story to tell and will try to exploit your weaknesses in different ways. And if you fail, well... You can always try again! Just try not to get too used to it, or you might start enjoying it.

Sprawling cities
The many settlements in Ardia offer a vast array of activities that will help you grow stronger and earn some money. Casino? Check. Bath house? Check. Secret laboratory with androids and giant robots? Check! Don't waste too much time though. The incubi back home are counting on you!

Character customization
You'll be able to modify some of the main character's features for a more personalized experience. This includes physical characteristics, inclinations, as well as many costumes you'll acquire through the game. Some NPCs get costumes as well, both friends and foes!

From time to time, incubi cross the portal between worlds to choose from among the hottest men on Earth who will be the next incubi king. 2429970.name: 翔太の毕业季
2429970.detailed_description:
Game description:

The male protagonist, Shota, is a college student who is about to enter the workplace, and he decides to do a workplace internship before graduation. I hope to gain more experience and growth through internships. During his internship, he met his colleague Narisse, who is a business expert in the company and is extremely serious and responsible for her work.
At the same time, Shota has a very close relationship with his classmates who have always adored him at school, and they help each other complete their graduation homework.
Throughout the story, many conversations and interactions take place between Shota and his friends, and their previous relationship becomes closer through the development of the plot.
One day, Shota heard that there were always some strange sounds in the school building at night, which made the students feel strange and uneasy, what caused it? Shota decided to find out for himself.

Game elements


Storyline
Modern background
Novel content
Multiple endings
Players interact with the protagonist to communicate with company colleagues, school classmates, etc., and interact to complete the main story progression
The story has few missions and a simple plot, defeating the witch to win the game!
The game is available in both Japanese and Chinese languages, and players can switch between settings and switch running modes

2430010.name: Gennady
2430010.detailed_description:
Support us


About the Game

Gennady is a hardcore mix of blood-acid substrate and black-and-white comics. There's always something getting in the way before that damn soap opera ends. This time, or forever, the blinding glow of the screen is interrupted by the depressing view of an alien garbage dump. It's like that dream where you're on a crowded bus wearing nothing but your underpants. Only this time it's not a bus, son!

In this world, you have to fight your way through the neatly cube-shaped biomass with your own body in order to — no, not to grab and buy something on Black Friday — to survive. Unless the vile creatures are lucky, their pitiful bodies will be disintegrated by the blaster, and if they indeed are lucky, their squirming remains will be hanging on laundry ropes and poles.



These sticky pages of the gloomy comic book are hard to turn, because of the caked green sludge, but somewhere at the end of this story there must be a cozy picture of home. It would be nice to get there soon, because sometimes it makes you wanna stay here forever, or at least spend a weekend.




Use furious dash to overcome obstacles, destroy environment and alien scum. Destroy everything you see, accumulate dash, and destroy even more.




Build up rage and go on a rampage, carrying yourself brokenly through green slurry and guts. There is no speed limit. Play as fast as you can with skill and aggression.






Each of your new runs will consist of a randomly generated corridor, of pre-made rooms. Don't get lost! Or if you can't go any further, just fix the repeater and play from the next level.






Many grim and dangerous biomes each with unique game mechanics and visual style.
- Live a work shift in a meatpacking plant
- Don't eat too much in the cafeteria
- Don't get eaten in the woods
- Beware of debt collectors in the city
- Enjoy an audience with the queen






Kill everyone with more than two tentacles! But in addition to mollusks, the hierarchy of this world includes nasty parasites, creatures with bones, and huge arthropods. And the cherry on the cake of this outrage is the biome bosses. 




There are dangerous machinery, traps, and just plain unsuitable working conditions all around. And no union! It's not all that dangerous if you have enough fingers to push the buttons and your reflexes are fine. 






Incredible replayability. Collect useful junk and upgrades to strengthen your character and his ability to smash alien faces. Collect a unique combination of junk and perks to make each new run feel different.

In order to buy junk, don't skimp on the larva. Without them, you're worthless. But they won't sit around waiting for you to collect them either.





Replayable incredibility. Choose your own way of fighting back. Have a classic brawl, a laser show, or turn into a huge squirrel and smash everything around you. Don't forget to take Frienemies - special creatures that radically alter the run, granting both bonuses and debuffs.




Dive into a world drawn with hand drawn frame-by-frame animation, with a black and white palette and just black humor. Blood, noir and green slurry.

In this world, you have to fight your way through the neatly cube-shaped biomass with your own body in order to — no, not to grab and buy something on Black Friday — to survive. Unless the vile creatures are lucky, their pitiful bodies will be disintegrated by the blaster, and if they indeed are lucky, their squirming remains will be hanging on laundry ropes and poles.



These sticky pages of the gloomy comic book are hard to turn, because of the caked green sludge, but somewhere at the end of this story there must be a cozy picture of home. It would be nice to get there soon, because sometimes it makes you wanna stay here forever, or at least spend a weekend.




Use furious dash to overcome obstacles, destroy environment and alien scum. Destroy everything you see, accumulate dash, and destroy even more.




Build up rage and go on a rampage, carrying yourself brokenly through green slurry and guts. There is no speed limit. Play as fast as you can with skill and aggression.






Each of your new runs will consist of a randomly generated corridor, of pre-made rooms. Don't get lost! Or if you can't go any further, just fix the repeater and play from the next level.






Many grim and dangerous biomes each with unique game mechanics and visual style.
- Live a work shift in a meatpacking plant
- Don't eat too much in the cafeteria
- Don't get eaten in the woods
- Beware of debt collectors in the city
- Enjoy an audience with the queen






Kill everyone with more than two tentacles! But in addition to mollusks, the hierarchy of this world includes nasty parasites, creatures with bones, and huge arthropods. And the cherry on the cake of this outrage is the biome bosses. 




There are dangerous machinery, traps, and just plain unsuitable working conditions all around. And no union! It's not all that dangerous if you have enough fingers to push the buttons and your reflexes are fine. 






Incredible replayability. Collect useful junk and upgrades to strengthen your character and his ability to smash alien faces. Collect a unique combination of junk and perks to make each new run feel different.

In order to buy junk, don't skimp on the larva. Without them, you're worthless. But they won't sit around waiting for you to collect them either.





Replayable incredibility. Choose your own way of fighting back. Have a classic brawl, a laser show, or turn into a huge squirrel and smash everything around you. Don't forget to take Frienemies - special creatures that radically alter the run, granting both bonuses and debuffs.




Dive into a world drawn with hand drawn frame-by-frame animation, with a black and white palette and just black humor. Blood, noir and green slurry.
2430010.short_description: An old-school action platformer with rogue-lite elements. Imagine your grumpy neighbor blowing up the backside of an alien world with a blaster instead of resting after his shift. Blood, noir, and green slime.

*languages with full audio support

2430020.name: A Game of Gods: Infinium
2430020.detailed_description:
A Game of Gods: Infinium is an ambitious new open world to explore. You wake on an island nation gripped by war with no memory of who you are. Recollect your memories as you make friends and enemies, each choice shaping the narrative. Reap the rewards of an affluent nation as you work jobs, do quests, & invest in real estate. Will you become a hero or a successful entrepreneur?

Infinium is a lush and beautiful island nation where kingdoms have rises and inevitably fell over the centuries. Today a relatively young race of beings, Man, claim the island for themselves. They sneer at those who came before and swiftly eradicate all in conquest. Decades of hostility towards the natural balance of life has led to the uprising of a new, angrier race; Kebari. Little is known of these sentient beings, however humans consider them to be the reincarnation of the ancestors they once dominated. Village elders often tell a tale of the Kebari manifesting from the sheer hatred of the forest.

This pack also comes with three pieces of 3 different kinds of 90-days vouchers, the most powerful pet, and enhancing materials. These are all in one package!

• 10 pieces of Zenith costume are included
• The costume pieces provided cannot be listed on Black Market

2. +15 Gear Booster X1
• 100% chance of enhancing your gear to +15

• 100% chance of the desired SS tuning option for your gear!

• Get 90 days of farm planting support!

8. Maid Service Voucher (30-Day) X3
• Get 90 days of My Room exploration support!

Notes:

• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

2430080.name: The Struggle to Survive the Dragon Siege
2430080.detailed_description:
The Struggle to Survive the Dragon Siege is a tower defense game in the style of plants vs zombies, you have to defend your castle from the waves of enemies that come to attack your city, with heroes who arranged their lives to protect the citizens. You have to place your characters in the lines, prepare your defense and win the victory.

Choose between different heroes and upgrades to face the calamity that awaits you, see how the enemies become stronger and stronger and be able to finish against the great green dragon.

Perhaps having a chance to fight against beings that stalk you normally may still sound cliché, but it is what it is. Defend what matters and create a better future, have the chance to prove that you are capable of achieving something that only special people can do. So get ready for a fast-paced gameplay.

A game of surviving the invasion of dragons which attack humans has sought a way to stop the invasion by peaceful means, but as always you have to resort to the easiest, death. It is not as if people are happy to do so, but the constant waves that are lived day by day in the cities that remain have shown them that you can not be peaceful with them.

Countless people have died to defend their loved ones, but over time heroes have appeared who are able to not only stand by and wait for the dragons, but are able to stand up to them and push them back. That is why they have set out on a journey to find a way to coexist with them.

Choose between different heroes and upgrades to face the calamity that awaits you, see how the enemies become stronger and stronger and be able to finish against the great green dragon.

Perhaps having a chance to fight against beings that stalk you normally may still sound cliché, but it is what it is. 2430080.short_description: The Struggle to Survive the Dragon Siege is a Tower Defense game inspired by Plants vs Zombies modernizing the formula to make this a unique experience. Different strategies to tackle the waves of enemies and be able to emerge victorious.

2429140.name: Procambarus fallax
2429140.detailed_description:
▽Synopsis: This is a visual novel game featuring toxic wave of electricity with a gameplay duration of 5-10 minutes. You will spend some bedtime moments with your “best friend” that can be either enjoyable or less pleasant. Will you take the medicine?

▽Warning: This game contains psychological horror, meta-game elements, and distressing episodes of mental disorder, which may cause intense discomfort.

▽Disclaimer: Claiming that “this game is based on real events” may easily lead others to identify specific individuals through their experiences. Therefore, please consider this game solely as a combination of abstract concepts and a textual gaming experience.

The author is a student developer and a fan of "どくでんぱ" games.This game pays homage to a game "Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk" that the author holds in high regard and really loves.You can see more information about me in the txt document in the game folder.

2429160.name: Doughbee
2429160.detailed_description:
Mysteriously crash landed on a strange world, stranded only with their trusted hovercraft to keep them safe. Doughbee must survive the wave-based bullet hell and overcome Deadly enemies and bosses. Use the hovercraft to blast all the foes trying to erase you from this trippy new reality.

Collect cash to upgrade your abilities and earn perks for unique playstyle customization. Defeat increasingly challenging enemies and bosses to survive 100+ rounds.

Basic Abilities

This arcade roguelike features twitchy 8 directional movements, a chargeable shot, dash and 3 custom actions. Collect cash from foes to purchase gumballs after every round and upgrade your hovercrafts 6 Attributes.


• Dodge attacks with increased Acceleration and Speed
• Enhance survivability with Regeneration and Dash Stamina
• Increase impact with Blaster Speed and Damage

Add Abilities with Perks!

Progress to unlock game-changing perks. All deadly or specialized in their own way, Perks can drastically alter your playstyle or cover a weak spot in your build. Stack perks or use them in combination to craft the most effective build. Choose wisely, new challenges will test the limits of your strategy.


• Overpower your foes with elemental damage, and explosive directional attacks
• Build a fortress with Decoy, Turrets, Portal and more structures
• Gain an instant edge with vehicles
• Survive with Vampire, Reincarnation, Time Slow and more
• Harpoon, Tracker, and Rambo change Dougbee’s shot
• Attack up close with elemental dashes, Pendulum and even a Sword


Face Challenging Foes

Crowds of dangerous reactive enemies will get your adrenaline pumping. Progress through the waves and face increasingly difficult foes.
Use cash and perks to upgrade accordingly and keep up with new threats. Higher level enemies will try to outmaneuver you with new mechanics and new tactics. Get hit too many times and you will start to fade away.

Prepare to Handle Elite Bosses!

10 unique boss fights, each with crazy abilities. Prepare in order to survive. Learn from your mistakes and create a build capable of defeating all 10 bosses. Choose perks wisely and balance your build to beat all 100 waves.


Survive for Rewards

Earn candy through gameplay. Use this resource in the menu between games.


• Customize Doughbee’s laser sight and reticle
• Pre purchase perks to get an edge in the next game
• Defeat bosses to unlock purchasable checkpoint starts

No microtransactions whatsoever, just a fun game. Play to unlock rewards.

Play to Unlock

Candy is not the only reward to earn in battle. Complete objectives and reach milestones to earn badges, tapes, and lore.


Badges can buff, upgrade or modify Doughbee and their perks.

Tapes are collected from bosses and can be played from the Boombox found in the menu. Loop and time warp 10 unique tracks.

Collect data for the Book of Sgiggy and gain a deep knowledge about the world Doughbee now inhabits.

Double the Chaos with local Co-op

Add a player 2 to any game and play linked with Doughbee as Calm. Use teamwork to create killer perk combanations and synergy. Work together and stay alive to defeat massive waves of enemies and high pressure boss rounds.


Features

• 100+ perilous waves
• 50+ game changing perks to combine and stack
• 6 attributes to level up
• 10 unique and deadly bosses
• 36+ enemy types to overcome
• 10 unlockable music tracks and a time warping Boombox
• Book of lore with 35+ discoverable pages
• 9 specialization badges for added re-playability
• Buyable cosmetics, starter perks, and skips to boss rounds.
• Zero microtransactions


Buy Doughbee now to engage in an epic battle against dangerous enemies and lethal bosses. Earn perks and choose your strategy. Allocate upgrades to create a unique playstyle every time for hours of nail-biting fun. Are you ready to survive?

Buy Doughbee now to engage in an epic battle against dangerous enemies and lethal bosses. Earn perks and choose your strategy. Allocate upgrades to create a unique playstyle every time for hours of nail-biting fun. Are you ready to survive?
2429160.short_description: A real time wave based roguelike about battling doodle creatures and collecting perks along the way, with ranging effects from elemental damage to things like rammer Doughbee and even a scorpion mech, see how far you can make it through this bullet hell of a nightmare.

2429220.name: Haunted Hotel: Personal Nightmare
2429220.detailed_description:
Elephant Games is proud to bring you another addition to the Haunted Hotel series!

After 20 years, you receive a letter about your missing mom and sister. Answers are waiting at the Freedom Hotel. When you arrive, you quickly find that nothing at the hotel is as it seems as your fears spring to life! Can you overcome them to save your family in time? Find out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure!

-Haunting Hidden Object scenes
-Dynamic puzzles and minigames
-Immersive dream sequences
-Investigate and solve the story-rich mystery of Haunted Hotel: Personal Nightmare

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

2429280.name: Rune Song
2429280.detailed_description:
Rune Song is a fast paced 2D action / adventure platformer with an emphasis on fluid movement and a unique cast of comedic characters. Take control of Baba as you navigate intricate challenges and traverse a mysterious whimsical world.

Baba is a fledgling wizard living at Rune Song Bakery, a magical establishment owned and operated by his equally magical grandparents. With a birthday fast approaching and the haze of early childhood fading, Baba is ready to begin contributing to the family business. His first task? Tracking down a gang of notorious dine and dashers who "forgot" to pay for their meals! With the alluring promise of a pastry party held on his special day, Baba must first bring every dasher to justice and prove he's prepared for whatever challenges life at Rune Song has in store for him!

Run, jump, swim, and crawl your way through a dozen handcrafted stages, each consisting of beautifully stylized pixel art with an attention to subtle details. Every location is wholly unique with stage specific environments, mechanics, and characters!

It's not all pastry parties and friendly faces in the world of Rune Song. Ranging from the most minor of slimes to a literal god of death, Baba will have plenty of foes to overcome with his trusty fireball spell! Just don't forget to manage your mana bar!

During your adventures, you'll experience the heart of what Rune Song has to offer, the unique array of memorable characters that inhabit the world. Running the gamut from friendly and endearing to goofy and slightly unhinged, there's no shortage of interesting characters to interact with! Or don't! Most dialogues are completely optional!

Every location is teeming with treasures and gold coins just waiting to be discovered. The further you venture off the beaten path, the more you'll be rewarded! Loot is the only way to upgrade your character and more importantly, have the funds for the biggest and best pastry party around! 

If variety is the spice of life, then Rune Song is a veritable witches brew of optional side quests! One of which consists of helping a witch complete her witches brew! There's always someone who could use a hand so make sure to do your part if you're feeling generous, you may even be rewarded!

Who doesn't love a good secret? I'll let slip a little something right now by telling you that Rune Song has loads of hidden locations, secret treasure chests, and tucked away challenge gauntlets! Players with a keen eye and sense of discovery will always have a reason to closely examine their surroundings!

2429260.name: Daycare Descent
2429260.detailed_description:
Naptime's over!

With rumbling stomachs and no snacks in sight, explore a deserted daycare overrun by vengeful toys. From the nap room to the basement storage, navigate through the eerie corridors and relentless toy onslaught in your quest for snacks.

Features:

  • Crawling Babies: Play as one of four toddlers crawling around the daycare. Careful standing up though, as walking around can result in tripping.
  • Tantrum-based Health System: As the players take damage, they inch closer to totally flipping out. Don't throw a tantrum for too long, or the attendant will take notice.
  • Toy-filled Chaos: Battle through waves of mischievous toy enemies, ranging from pint-sized troublemakers to formidable toy bosses.
  • Uncanny labyrinth: From the Daycare's nap room, traverse the halls and delve into the eerie cellar in search of snacks.

Characters:

  • Dillian: The French-Korean baby, self-appointed leader of the snack brigade
  • Joah-Joah: The buff baby, muscle of the group
  • Phoebe: The toy expert, hungriest of them all
  • Travis: The lookout, aware of his surroundings

2429260.short_description: Daycare Descent is a co-op shooter inspired by Left 4 Dead. Take control of our four trepid adventurers as they battle toys throughout the daycare in search of snacks. Tighten your diapers, grab your pacifiers, and fill up your water guns. Playtime's just begun!

2429310.name: Noxious Weeds
2429310.detailed_description:
Add Noxious Weeds to your wishlist! 💖


About the Game

The corruption is spreading! Hordes of evil creatures are coming your way!

You are a former adventurer who retired, looking for a peaceful farming life.

Did you really think the days of dangerous adventures and fetch quests were finally over?

Too bad, no cozy farming here! Grab the tools and slay the monsters before they taint your fields.

  • Resist waves of enemies through nights and days.

  • 20 minutes play sessions.

  • A variety of upgradeable Tools to wipe out the swarm once and for all. Your belt can carry a maximum of 6; your choices will change the outcome.

  • Rescue and team up with the cutest companions. Some will heal you, while others will fight at your side.

  • Collect the perfect crop combination to achieve game-breaking builds.

  • Accessibility. Tweak monsters' health, speed, and damage to better suit your play style.

Demo content

  • 19 Tools to choose from.

  • 3 Playable characters.

  • 46 Harvest items for incredible builds.

  • 3 Different companions.

  • Spring season difficulty.

  • 2 Characters and 6 crops unlockable through Steam Achievements.

Inspired by the masters of rogue-lite survivor/bullet hell games: Risk of Rain, Vampire Survivors, and Brotato.

2429330.name: VR-太阳系
2429330.detailed_description:
• Welcome to our unique space exploration journey! Here, you will personally experience the realistic space environment, feel the free floating without gravity and the stunning scenery of the starry sky. Be prepared to release yourself, move freely in the universe, and explore the mysterious objects around you.
    As soon as you step into our space amusement park, you will be ushered into a brand new universe world. Experience the charming charm of weightlessness, floating freely like an astronaut. You can explore interstellar ships, planetary surfaces, and space stations, and observe the wonders of the universe up close, as if you are in person.
    In our space simulator, you will personally experience thrilling spacewalks and space flights. Challenge your balance and courage to become a true explorer in the universe. At the same time, looking up at the beauty of the starry sky, immersed in the mystery and infinite possibilities of the universe.
    Whether you are a science fiction enthusiast, space exploration enthusiast, or an adventurer full of curiosity about the unknown, our space exploration journey will definitely captivate you. Bring your curiosity and courage to explore this realistic and beautiful space world together!

  • When I stepped into this unparalleled solar system simulator, I was immediately attracted by the charming scenery of the universe. I feel the freedom without gravity, like an astronaut floating freely in virtual space. I gazed at every planet in the solar system, witnessing their movements and trajectories firsthand.
    First of all, I quietly watched Mars, shining red like a flame, with an elegant orbit revolving around the sun. Then, I witnessed the charm of Venus, emitting a bright light in the sky, dazzling like a gem.
    I gazed at Saturn's magnificent halo, spinning around itself like an elegant dancer. Jupiter, on the other hand, showcases its massive gas atmosphere and mysterious red spots, which fills me with awe.
    I continued to walk and observe Mercury, Pluto, and other planets, each with unique characteristics and ways of movement. I couldn't help but be deeply attracted by the magnificent scenery of the universe, as if integrating into it through time and space.
    This journey to the solar system is so unforgettable that I feel the mystery and infinite possibilities of the universe. I witnessed the motion of planets firsthand, as if I had become a part of the universe myself. Whether you are an astronomy enthusiast or someone curious about the mysteries of the universe, this solar system stroll will bring you a lifetime unforgettable experience!
    First person experience walking in the solar system to observe how the eight planets move!

  • Wearing a VR helmet, you will instantly be taken into a realistic space world. Walking immersively between the stars, experiencing the infinite vastness and mystery of the universe. You will witness the elegant movements of the eight planets with your own eyes, and observe their beauty and uniqueness up close.
    With the guidance of virtual reality technology, you will personally control spacecraft, fly freely in the universe, and explore unknown galaxies and planets. Experience free movement in a gravity free environment, appreciate the brilliance of the starry sky and the magnificent scenery of galaxies.
    In this VR space tour, you can truly experience the excitement and fun of space exploration. Join us now and embark on your space journey!

2429340.name: Valley of The Savage Run
2429340.detailed_description:
Move both frogs in sync and try to reach the end of the level before the predator catches them. Only 5% of all players are able to activate their left and right brain hemispheres at the same time to move both frogs in sync. Are you one of them?





You control a white frog and a black frog. They work as a team. The white frog hops on white tiles, and the black frog hops on black tiles.

Sometimes one frog has to carry the other because there are no matching tiles. Other times, one frog has to unblock the tiles of the other, so both can continue forward.

Teleports are tricky. The frogs may have to hop on each other's backs before and after entering the teleport in order to match the right tiles on the entrance and exit.

Meanwhile, you have to move fast. A predator chases the frogs and tries to catch them. Sometimes you can deceive it and use it to unblock your way.

2429360.name: The Sandwich Making Experience
2429360.detailed_description:
The Sandwich Making Experience is an asymmetrical party game that is designed to bring instant entertainment to any gathering. In The Sandwich Making Experience, players take turn being the sandwich maker, while the others play as the sandwich breaker, both competing to complete their objectives.

Prepare to enter a sandwich making extravaganza!
Compete head-to-head with your friends in this local party game to prove that you are the best at making sandwiches under pressure and under attack! Enter the kitchen to cook it out in a 1v1 (or up to 1v4 with controllers) where anything goes winner takes all in a battle to the death (not really it is a competition and nobody hopefully dies).


Maker (VR)
Try your best to make a randomly selected sandwich against before the time runs out. Cook and stack your way to victory! Use your height to your advantage and be careful not to let leave anything unattended for too long, you have a little friend who is eagerly waiting to cause some trouble! and be careful not to start any fires...

Breaker (Keyboard)
Prevent the maker from making a sandwich at any cost! Use your small height and slippery speed to your advantage as you do everything in your power to be the biggest nuisance to the maker as possible!

2429480.name: Gotchaball
2429480.detailed_description:
Demo out now!

Real Ballers play with Controllers!


About the Game

Features

  • Couch Multiplayer Chaos for 2-4 Players: Grab your friends for fast-paced local action in free for all or team battles!

  • Unleash Crazy Items to Take Control: Pick up and use quirky items to gain the upper hand. Knock the ball loose, KO opponents with a perfectly timed throw, and change the flow of the game.

  • Asymmetric Gameplay: Chase or be chased! The roles flip in an instant as players swap between running for the ball or escaping with it.

  • Unique Levels With Gimmicks: Each arena is packed with its own twists and challenges, testing your platforming and strategic thinking skills in new ways.

  • Steam remote play: Play with friends online through Steam Remote Play!

About the Game

Welcome to a fast-paced platformer sports game where quick reflexes and smart tactics are key. Race to capture totems, outplay opponents, and secure victory!

Dive into competitive couch multiplayer with Free-for-All and Team-based modes, where every match is fast, unpredictable, and action-packed!

Core Gameplay

This game is all about the thrill of chasing and escaping. When you're not holding the ball, hunt down the ball-holder. Once you have it, outmaneuver your opponents to capture totems and score points.

Scoring won’t be easy—your rivals will do everything to knock the ball from your hands. With constant shifts between offense and defense, the fast-paced gameplay rewards both strategy and skill.

2429380.name: 淤積的祈禱（Silted Prayer）
2429380.detailed_description:
Synopsis:

The world is filled with curses that can corrode the World Tree and at the same time nurture it and all living things. There are ten major races living in the world created by the gods. The protagonist, Carrol, lives in the distant and luminous forest, away from the mundane world. She has just inherited the title of Duke from her deceased father and is preparing to inspect her territory when she meets a elf girl who has descended from the sky... As a vampire who has lived to the present, with a strong self-esteem and memories in her heart, what kind of things will Carrol encounter in the future...

Game features:

The Curse Accumulation System and the Binding of the Lamb God will affect the difficulty of some battles and the direction of the plot. The personality-rich side-scrolling battle module and skill performances add to the experience, and there are six difficulty levels to accommodate different players' needs. There are over 15 playable characters, each with their own unique skill animations. The game also features rich maps and a compelling storyline, with both normal and hidden endings.

Game time：

8hours and more

Role introduction:


Carrol, a vampire girl, inherited the title of the former lord.


Leimi, an elf girl who descended from the sky.


Belia, a former monster hunter who appears in various places.


Kris, a girl who calls herself a novice adventurer.


Bamanta, a warrior of the red dragon clan.


Ashes，？？？

Welcome to visit my promotional website,the patches required for this operation can be downloaded from this website..
We are looking for the cooperation of game publishers or translators, if there is a transaction request, please contact my email.

2429450.name: Woodcutter
2429450.detailed_description: Woodcutter is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real carpenter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of window architraves: creating a workpiece blank, choosing the shape of the future architraves, sawing, milling, painting, etc. The player is invited to make a window casing step by step: glue a blank from the boards, choose the shape of the product, cut the blank, mill it, paint it. The owner of the workshop will help you go through all the stages of manufacturing, who throughout the game will tell you what and how to do, as well as some interesting facts about carpentry. To get acquainted with the features of management, a training mode is provided.

2429410.name: NightHover
2429410.detailed_description:
The NightCity at night is a hoverbike racing arena. Have fun in 43 levels, gaining speed upgrades, shock powerups to slow other racers, repairing powerups and rockets to shoot kamikaze drones.

Simplified controls make it possible for everyone to fly. Just go up and down, turn left and right.

At the end of the 40 levels, 3 time challenges are available for unlimited gameplay.

Switch to the first person view for more immersive gameplay.

Plays best with a controller! The right stick used for steering left and right is very sensitive. It will be needed later, when racing becomes more extreme.

"NightHover" is also available now for free in Google Play on Android. Steering on Android is done by turning the phone like a steering wheel. You might want to try it, if you do not like a keyboard or a controller.

2429490.name: Nextbots In The Backrooms
2429490.detailed_description:
Nextbots are mysterious and very dangerous entities that inhabit endless mazes of backrooms. Once you were unlucky enough to fall from your reality into their otherworldly world. Such accidents sometimes happen and now it has happened to you. From now on you have only one job - to survive and find your way out! Remember, each level of Backrooms is dangerous in its own way and you will constantly have to adapt to new conditions.

This game is a classic first-person indie horror game. In the menu you can choose from eight available levels. On each level you have only one goal: to find a way out. You have no weapons, you are always defenseless against the inhabitants of Backrooms and if you encounter them, escape is your only chance to survive. As you explore the different levels, you will encounter different dangers. For example, the level "The Lobby" is a big labyrinth in which it is easy to get lost, and the level "Habitable Zone" is inhabited by an entity that is a threat and appears only in the dark.

List of levels:
Explore hallways and rooms of the most incredible shapes and sizes. You will be able to visit 8 levels of Backrooms, including: The Lobby, Habitable Zone, Pipe Dreams, Fun, Sublimity, The Windows, Level !, The End. Unique dangers await you on each level!



Entities:
The creatures that inhabit this place are far more terrifying than anything you've seen before. They are nothing like the inhabitants of the original Backrooms, but they are far more dangerous. If you hear a strange noise, just run, because the creature that made that noise has definitely heard you!



Immersive atmosphere:
Realistic graphics and sounds, as well as responsive character controls, create the atmosphere of the original Backrooms travel videos.

2429530.name: Crystal Tower Defense
2429530.detailed_description:
In Crystal Tower Defense you stop an endless amount of crystal-type enemies from reaching the portal to Earth. To achieve this goal you can build your own labyrinth using turrets and walls as well as selling obstacles on the map. You will need to stay alert since the enemies grow stronger the longer you defend the portal. Upgrade your turrets and alter the labyrinths layout to adapt to the new challenges.




Enemies will follow the path YOU create! This challenges you to experiment with different labyrinth layouts. The map, with its randomly generated obstacles, will tickle your strategic thinking every time you jump into a run. Remove map obstacles to open up new possibilities during a run and restructure your labyrinth to use each of your turrets to its full potential.




As you progress through the stages, you can unlock 10 turrets.
You can upgrade each turret's main stats in a run. The required gold is earned through destroying the enemies.

  • Range
  • Damage
  • Reload Time




Use 6 different abilities to support the turrets in your labyrinth and fend off the enmies.




Each enemy has a chance to drop crystals! These crystals are your primary currency and are used to unlock new and different turrets, as well as permanently upgrade them. Completing a stage rewards you with a big crystal that holds permanent upgrades for your turrets! You can equip these upgrades in the armory.
These big crystals can only be obtained playing the game. After each stage you get rewarded one big crystal. To claim them, you need to end your run manually, if you run out of lifes, you lose all your gathered rewards.
The higher the cleared stage is, the better are the rewards. The drop chance of each rarity, per stage, can be found in the menu.




The forge gives you the possibility of merging your hard-earned upgrades, to achieve bigger and better bonuses. Combine a multitude of possible items and find the best possible upgrade path!
Combining your upgrades always results in a better bonus. Combine multiple of the same, to decided the result type.

  • Range
  • Damage
  • Reload Time
  • Cost Reduction
  • Armor Damage
  • Shield Damage

2429540.name: Harmonis: the hand-made kingdoms
2429540.detailed_description:
DISCORD


ROADMAP


About the Game



Harmonis: The Hand-Made Kingdoms is a minimalist strategy game where your creativity takes center stage. Shape living kingdoms using unique tiles, each contributing to a vibrant and dynamic world. Explore diverse biomes, from lush forests to arid deserts, and uncover hidden secrets as you journey through your handcrafted realms.



In Harmonis, the world is not just a static backdrop. Unlike traditional games, our living kingdoms are inhabited by residents with their own stories and personalities. These characters add life and depth to your creations, influencing the atmosphere and dynamics of your world. Your interactions with the residents will shape the evolution of your kingdoms, making each playthrough unique and engaging.



Unlock new elements to enhance your kingdoms, adding layers of depth and strategy. Each new tile and character brings fresh opportunities and challenges, encouraging you to think creatively and plan meticulously. Whether you’re constructing a bustling village or a tranquil sanctuary, every choice shapes the destiny of your living world!

2429590.name: Caislean: Paranormal
2429590.detailed_description:
Moloch Castle has a deep history and has recently gained attention through a viral video showcasing a haunting. It's up to the Ballymont Paranormal Group to investigate the castle. It appears that there is more than meets the eye... Place equipment and gadgets during the day in order to survive the threats of the night.

Featuring:
  • First Person day sections
  • Point and Click night sections
  • Custom Night game mode with 3 new enemy types

Investigate the castle during the day and place cameras, sensors, and snares throughout the explored environment. You must use your investigation skills to determine the locations of paranormal hotspots and find clues about countering new enemy types.

Unravel the mysterious downfall of the Moloch family and lay their souls to rest.

[** From the developer **]
This game was created over the course of 2.5 years by one person. Would love to hear constructive feedback!

2429600.name: Herdles
2429600.detailed_description:
Play as a witch’s canine familiar tasked with saving magical creatures and solving a mystery.
Herdles walks the line between an epic adventure and a puzzle platformer, using barking as the main mechanic of the game.

Explore a dynamic environment of lush hills and forests that get increasingly more magical as the game progresses.
There is no combat or death, instead you are offered multiple humorous and puzzly solutions to deal with adversaries in the game.

A Bark Changes Everything

Everything reacts to your bark. Reveal secrets, trigger mechanisms, and explore an interactive world full of magic and wonder!

All Roads Lead To Home

There are multiple ways to progress through the world. Experiment and think out of the box to find the most efficient and/or funniest solutions to any obstacle you might face.

No Hurdles, Just Herdles

Herdles has a strong focus on modern accessibility and offers settings to accommodate people with various disabilities, but also includes a variety of options that change the game itself. Tune the game to your needs/preferences and play it as a challenging parkour with lots of dangers or as a cozy experience without conflict.

2429600.short_description: Jump, run, bark! Adventure through an interactive world full of wonders where your bark can change everything! Save the magical Herdles and solve the mystery behind their very existence. Fully adjust the gameplay experience to suit your needs and preferences.

2428680.name: Infernal Apocalypse: Rise of the Underworld
2428680.detailed_description:
ABANDON ALL HOPE

You wake up to find yourself in the depths of Hell, surrounded by an endless sea of tortured souls. As a low-rank demon, your job is to supply Satan with Slaves. But deep down, you know there's another way out...

CHOOSE YOUR DEMON!

Each demon has a different skill set.

INVADE EARTH!

Get to Jerusalem to retrieve a bone from Jesus' remains.

AWAKEN LONG-DEAD FOES

Gather resources, build your base, and train more demons!


With the help of your fellow demons(other players), you begin to build your own kingdom in the shadows, preparing for the ultimate battle for supremacy against the Devil and his minions.

EPIC GAMEPLAY:

  • Ever changing world. You don't know what the terrain will be down there.
  • Co-op or PVP. It's not easy managing a kingdom in the depths of Hell. Split work with your friends.
  • Terrain matters, so make sure to carefully plan attacks.
  • Tweak the Rules of the game by signing secret contracts with the Devil.
  • Recruit notable figures from history.
  • Gather prayers.
  • Demons have counters. Use them wisely!

GAME MODES:

  • Single-player story.
  • Co-op story.
  • Team Deathmatch.
  • Survival.

Get ready to immerse yourself. Claim your rightful place as the ruler of the Infernal Kingdom, and show the Devil who's really in charge. The souls of the damned are counting on you.

ALL IN MULTIPLAYER!

Each Team has shared resources, buildings, and an army.

As a low-rank demon, you and your friends build your own kingdom, manage slaves and resources, fight hordes of demons, and rise up the ranks until you meet Satan himself. After all, our eternal damnation is certain, so why not practice beforehand?

2428690.name: Neon Parkour 2
2428690.detailed_description:
Control a blue cube and complete challenging trails and puzzles to reach the target!

Watch out for platforms that fade when you press on them, red cubes that will destroy you the moment you touch them! Help the blue cube reach its destination in Neon Parkour, which has a minimal design. Jump, dash and swing to solve challenging trails!



Harder, Faster, Better, Same Price

With the same price as the first game, Neon Parkour 2 is even harder than the first game, which everyone says is very difficult! However, we have made the game more fluent and faster. And we’ve put Neon Parkour 2 in a situation where you’ll want to try your luck again instead of getting bored and shutting it down.

One of our biggest mistakes in the first game was that it took a long time to reload the level after death and the trails were not suitable for fast gameplay. In Neon Parkour 2, you are reborn as you are dead now and you don’t expect to be among the levels at all. We are also developing new trails by making them suitable for fast gameplay!



For Both Challengers and Speedrunners

If you are a fan of speedrunning, Neon Parkour 2 is the game you are looking for! See your stats with in-game time and death counters, and play again for a better score on your next try!

One of the upcoming innovations with Neon Parkour 2 is Challenger Mode. In challenger mode, a mode that pops up once you’ve finished the game, we’ve packed the entire game into a single scene. In this way, it will be possible to finish the game from zero to the end without any interruptions. The challenge is that there are only 1 checkpoints per 5 levels in this mode!



Decorate Your Steam Profile

You can use the achievements you will earn at the end of each episode to enhance and decorate your Steam profile!



Control Is In Your Hands

We've introduced some minor improvements to the game so you can play Neon Parkour 2 the way you want, and we've made some changes to some of the systems in the first game:

1) Visuality: If you think the visual style of the Neon Parkour 2 can make you tired, don’t worry! In the settings, you can make the visual as simple as possible or increase the value of the visual effects!

2) Camera: In the first game of Neon Parkour, the distance of the camera was constant. In NP 2, we left the camera distance control to the player. You can zoom in and out of the camera in any part of the game.

3) Music Player: We have replaced the music player that existed in the first game and made it more functional. We added more music options to the game and made sure that they were not a headache when they played for a long time while making the game musics.

2428700.name: Fallen Light
2428700.detailed_description:
Explore a post-apocalyptic world
You haven't been here in years, and when you come back everything is destroyed. Figure out what happened, discover long lost secrets and behold the horrific scenery. Each point in the game allows you to openly explore the area and figure out a way to escape into the next dystopian landscape.

Gather resources and craft tools
Find materials around the old wasteland, use them to craft futuristic tools. These tools can help you navigate the world around you, solve puzzles and fix what is broken.

Evade what lurks in the dark
You aren't alone in this world. there are things out there that what to find you, things that want you gone, that want you to pay for what you did. Run, hide and outsmart these monsters to make your way out.

2428730.name: SWAT Commander: Prologue
2428730.detailed_description:
SWAT Commander: Prologue is the FREE prologue version of the upcoming team tactical shooter and does not reflect the final version of the game.
In it you face the challenges of its first mission either in co-op or single-player mode. Assume the role of your squad's commander to investigate a gloomy house that serves as a hideout for a gang of kidnapping fanatics.





Take on the commanding role for an advanced special weapons and tactics team. SWAT Commander places great focus on realism, drawing not only from the rich history of tactical games, but also real-life situations that saw need for such units to be deployed. Your squad members follow your lead, but also actively respond to various situations themselves to effectively combat hostiles and follow police protocol. Make sure you issue the correct orders but also remember that you'll be right there in the middle of the action, performing many tasks yourself!





As a highly-trained operative and member of a key tactical unit, you and your people will be sent on a number of highly dangerous missions. Become the witness of hostage situations, robberies, gang wars, and many other criminal activities. Complete missions with AI operatives or with your friends in co-op mode of up to 5 players!





Equip your team members with the right gear for the role that you intend for them, be it offense, support, or defense. This makes up three different categories.
Weapons:
- semi-automatic handguns
- submachine guns
- automatic rifles
- shotguns
- as well as an array of non-lethal measures
Apparel:
- light armor
- heavy armor
- ballistic shields
- various headgear
Utilities:
- grenades
- high explosives
- first aid
- a lockpick
- a battering ram





Properly equipping your SWAT team is only the first step. Every situation you and your squad end up in requires careful assessment if you want to bring everyone back to headquarters in one piece. Pay attention to the briefing and study whatever intel you get before you set out to complete the mission. SWAT Commander is set in a number of different settings, from offices to industrial compounds to even a sprawling old mansion. It is up to you to know the paths for your team to take, the available cover and the potential hazards in the form of armed hostiles and innocent bystanders. Always be aware of your surroundings or suffer the consequences.





Always know what you're doing, but more importantly - know why you're doing it. The game features missions with a number of different objectives:
- eliminating bloodthirsty terrorists,
- capturing ruthless criminals,
- rescuing vulnerable hostages,
- recovering valuable intel,
- securing crucial evidence,
- clearing key locations of hostiles.
Use your tactical wit to the best of your abilities. Don't leave anything up to chance by using a special system of order queuing to ensure a smooth sequence of actions among your units.

Keep your head down and keep it clear but press on and complete that mission. A good strategy is the key to succeeding in SWAT Commander.

2428830.name: Butterfly//Circuit Demo
2428830.detailed_description:
"The dead are no longer inflicted on any place or space-time, they can find no resting place; they are thrown into a radical utopia."
Symbolic Exchange & Death — Jean Baudrillard

Story


Hope is hard to come by in small backwater industrial towns, so when her one glimmer of light is snuffed out, Amelia Morrison has no choice but to leave for the city. Unfortunately, escape is not so easy.
Even in new territory, the past remains present, and the shadows cast by the looming concrete sky obscures the real. In the dark recesses of the city, just out of sight, silhouettes come in to view and connections start to form. While the city-machine whirrs like clockwork, Amelia is trapped in it's intestinal wires, grasping for the truth. Yet the question remains: is there even a truth to be found?

And once you start digging there's no going back.

In the dark recesses of the city, just out of sight, silhouettes come in to view and connections start to form. Butterfly//Circuit is a cyberpunk thriller kinetic visual novel.

2428780.name: The Last Stand at Camp Zombie
2428780.detailed_description:
Pan Pan Boom Boom!

Face hordes of zombie in this black and white, top down shooter! Alone or in local coop, annihilate everything -and everyone- that stands in your way in order to make a safe exit from Zombie Camp!
Camp Zombie is a cooperative arcade game with a fun and immediate concept, incorporating some mechanics from a zombie mode with the easy handling of a top-down shooter, all with a unique graphical style!



Explore the multiple rooms to increase your firepower and purchase every single boost to match the ever increasing waves of zombies! Beware, however, as darkness might become an even bigger problem that those putrid foes.

A word from the manager!

In our post-apocalyptic zombie world, will you be able to survive my life-threatening, hyper-modern escape game? Try your best not to die, or be prepared to become zombies for the next challengers!



Please note, you must connect at least one controller to play local multiplayer.

2428790.name: Des racines et des graines
2428790.detailed_description:
Des Racines et des Graines (Roots and Seeds but in french) is a garden game where the player will explore an island with different species of plants and trees. Each day you're uncovering this new environment and its history. You will gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree : Yggdrasil.

. Enjoy a free cozy game
. Explore a beautifull hand-draw island
. Experiment with mysterious plants
. Gaming experience around 1h


Please note, due to its short playing experience and its production over 48 hours, the game does not offer a saving system.

Some sounds were produced by digifishmusic, klankbeeld, Noted451, DBS_Sounds, cupido-1 & jgrzinich and distributed by FreeSound.

2428940.name: Recordance
2428940.detailed_description:
2223 Giant corporations have perfected a process called 'Transference'
This process allows the consciousness of an individual to be transferred
to a mechanoid host. You are one of these individuals…

Unleash your arsenal of innovative dual arm weapon systems to defeat the robots!
Choose from modules including Blaster, HeatSeeker, T-Beam, Smartgun, Mortar and more!
Upgrade modules for greater damage or fire rate as you progress.
12 Modules are currently available with more coming.

Combine weapons to take apart your enemies in more creative ways!
Hold enemies in place with the T-Beam whilst dismembering with the blaster or attach a mine before throwing them at your enemies. You are only limited by your imagination!

Take on varied mission modes including Wave, Elimination, Race and Survival
Keep things interesting with a variety of challenging mission types. With more mission types under development!

Complete mission challenge objectives and fight your way up the leaderboards
Meet mission objectives such as time limits, damage limits or credits gained to place on live leaderboards. Each mission has it's own leaderboard!

Customise your droid and vehicles
Upgrade both your droids and vehicles stats as well as cosmetics. Unlock and upgrade weapons on cars (bikes coming soon). More vehicles and droid models will be released as the game develops.

2428980.name: Bye Sweet Carole
2428980.detailed_description:
Wishlist now!


Wishlist to help Lana to wake up!


More Great Games!


About the Game

Welcome to Corolla...

With art inspired by classic animated movies and a story from Chris Darril (Remothered series), Bye Sweet Carole is a narrative-horror game that has you embark on a dark whimsicle tale full of mystery, intrigue and secrets.

The story is about to begin...

Set in the early 1900s, in an age where the women's suffrage movement has begun to shake the British nation, young Lana Benton must follow the last known trail of Carole Simmons to find her best friend and uncover the dark truth behind the Bunny Hall orphanage. As Lana dives further into the enigma, she will find herself poised between the real world and the fantastic kingdom of Corolla that is under the cruel influence of the terrifying Mr.Kyn, the insensitive owl Velenia, and the ravenous colonies of tar bunnies. You must tread carefully between the two realms to find a way out.

Key Features :

  • Embark on a horrific journey through a dark tale set in the austere Bunny Hall and the mesmerizing world of Corolla.

  • Immerse yourself in a hand-drawn universe brought to life using cinematographic techniques inspired by the greatest animated movies.

  • Shape-shift into a rabbit and harness your various forms to conquer the deadly challenges that await you.

  • Encounter a vibrant cast of characters, from your loyal friend Mr. Baesie to the malevolent owl Velenia and the terrifying Mr. Kyn.

  • A unique journey born from the union of 2 diametrically opposed genres: a traditional animated fairy tale, in the most typical tradition of the princesses from the world of cinematic animation, and a survival horror with old school platform elements.

2428990.name: Brothers in Hell
2428990.detailed_description:
After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance. Get back on your feet, and claim your revenge in this stealth action-adventure game

Fulfill Your Wish

You’ve been brought back with a single purpose: revenge. Attack the villages ravaged by the sinister and enslaving “Apocalypse Bringers”, who have plunged the world into chaos, and liberate them from their tyranny.

Stealthy Action and Multiple Tools

Use your bow and arrow to eliminate enemies from a distance. You can distract foes with an arrow and attack them from behind, or wait and confront them head-on with lethal axe strikes.

Confront the “Apocalypse Bringers”

Liberate villages from their control and face their bosses. Each boss has unique mechanics that will alter your gameplay. Who knows? Maybe you can even save some of them.

Immersive Open World

Explore the desert’s stories, complete missions for upgrades, and uncover the darkest secrets, shrouded in blood and sand.
