2429040.name: Lord Of Terror
2429040.detailed_description:
This game will receive a massive overhaul by early 2025 please wishlist this game and stay tuned! Also please do not buy this game for now it is not worth it yet

Massive sale incoming after complete re-make of the game! please add this game to your wishlist

In a galaxy far away a world is facing a doomsday. As nations rise against each other the world is plunged into chaos. Many illegal groups such as gangs and independent militias and demonic cults take the advantage of the situation to expand.

As a volunteer militia your task is to travel to a dungeon and assassinate a demon dubbed "Lord of Terror". According to intel, the demon is using a strange and unknown artifact to draw power from it, which would allow the demon to regain its former power. You must stop the demon before it does so.

This game is a FPS shooter game. Slay foul demons and undead and other foul creatures. There are more than 25 different types of enemies.

There are few things to remember while playing this game

esc to exit

1 to save current level

2 to continue from the saved level

c to change between vr and desktop mode (does not work in the main menu before the game begins)

r to reload

right mouse button to activate ironsight

left mouse button to shoot

There are twenty levels but each level looks exactly the same except for the last level, but as you make progress more powerful abomination will be added to the random spawn list.

In order to play in VR mode it is recommended to enable your VR headset first before launching this game.

Virtual reality is supported and the game will know if your headset (vive, occulus rift) is enabled. Please press 'c' to change between desktop mode and VR mode. When playing in VR mode please note that controllers are disabled and only mouse and keyboards are enabled. You do not need to have controllers for this game; it would be like your VR headset is a desktop monitor.

Thank you for visiting this store page.

2429090.name: Garden Buddies
2429090.detailed_description:
Our other games




About the Game

Step into the world of Garden Buddies and unleash your inner gardener. Cultivate a vibrant garden with adorable companion Mutsy, finding joy and peace. Nurture your virtual garden, overcome challenges, and celebrate achievements together. Garden Buddies invites you to a tranquil oasis, where creating brings calm and balance.



Simple and Fun

Simplicity reigns supreme in Garden Buddies, offering a chance to unwind and immerse yourself in soothing gameplay. The game's intuitive mechanics and user-friendly interface effortlessly guide your journey, encouraging relaxation and focusing on the captivating experience that awaits.


Friendship Is Key

Companionship takes center stage as you embark on delightful encounters with adorable animals and extraordinary plant creatures every day. By forming a bond with these charming critters, you'll help them overcome hurdles through engaging and delightful mini-games. These challenges entertain and bring a sense of accomplishment and camaraderie.


Heal Your Mind

Garden Buddies goes beyond the joy of gardening and mini-games, providing a healing experience for your mind and soul. Step away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, take a deep breath, and let the game guide you toward inner peace.


Explore

Explore essential life skills like box breathing and grounding techniques, while delving into emotions and engaging in discussions that promote emotional well-being. Garden Buddies becomes your virtual oasis, offering a safe haven to reduce stress and anxiety, all while immersing yourself in the beauty of digital nature.


Escape to Tranquility

Get ready to escape to a world where tranquility and companionship flourish. Let Garden Buddies be your guides as you cultivate not only a breathtaking flower garden but also a renewed sense of calm and balance in your life. Uncover the therapeutic power of gardening and embark on a journey of self-discovery and joy. Are you ready to find solace in the embrace of Garden Buddies? Your peaceful sanctuary awaits.


Features:
  • 90-minute story mode filled with enchanting narratives, heartwarming interactions, and unexpected twists.
  • Multiple Game Modes
  • A Soothing soundtrack made for relaxation and harmony
  • A healing experience for the mind, introducing essential life skills such as mindfulness exercises, stress reduction techniques, and emotional well-being practices
  • Charming characters and animal companions
  • Multiple customization options– unlock an array of decorative items and accessories for your oasis of peace and quiet.
2429090.about_the_game:
Step into the world of Garden Buddies and unleash your inner gardener. Cultivate a vibrant garden with adorable companion Mutsy, finding joy and peace. Nurture your virtual garden, overcome challenges, and celebrate achievements together. Garden Buddies invites you to a tranquil oasis, where creating brings calm and balance.



Simple and Fun

Simplicity reigns supreme in Garden Buddies, offering a chance to unwind and immerse yourself in soothing gameplay. The game's intuitive mechanics and user-friendly interface effortlessly guide your journey, encouraging relaxation and focusing on the captivating experience that awaits.


Friendship Is Key

Companionship takes center stage as you embark on delightful encounters with adorable animals and extraordinary plant creatures every day. By forming a bond with these charming critters, you'll help them overcome hurdles through engaging and delightful mini-games. These challenges entertain and bring a sense of accomplishment and camaraderie.


Heal Your Mind

Garden Buddies goes beyond the joy of gardening and mini-games, providing a healing experience for your mind and soul. Step away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, take a deep breath, and let the game guide you toward inner peace.


Explore

Explore essential life skills like box breathing and grounding techniques, while delving into emotions and engaging in discussions that promote emotional well-being. Garden Buddies becomes your virtual oasis, offering a safe haven to reduce stress and anxiety, all while immersing yourself in the beauty of digital nature.


Escape to Tranquility

Get ready to escape to a world where tranquility and companionship flourish. Let Garden Buddies be your guides as you cultivate not only a breathtaking flower garden but also a renewed sense of calm and balance in your life. Uncover the therapeutic power of gardening and embark on a journey of self-discovery and joy. Are you ready to find solace in the embrace of Garden Buddies? Your peaceful sanctuary awaits.


Features:
  • 90-minute story mode filled with enchanting narratives, heartwarming interactions, and unexpected twists.
  • Multiple Game Modes
  • A Soothing soundtrack made for relaxation and harmony
  • A healing experience for the mind, introducing essential life skills such as mindfulness exercises, stress reduction techniques, and emotional well-being practices
  • Charming characters and animal companions
  • Multiple customization options– unlock an array of decorative items and accessories for your oasis of peace and quiet.
2429090.short_description: Unleash your inner gardener and immerse yourself in the serene world of Garden Buddies, cultivating a vibrant flower garden alongside your new friend Mutsy. Discover an enchanting and fulfilling experience to release your stress.

2429110.name: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six® Extraction - HD Textures Pack
2429110.detailed_description:
The HD texture pack for Rainbow Six® Extraction allows for a better visual experience by upgrading some of the most common textures in the game to a new level of visual fidelity, such as characters and weapons. This pack needs additional space on HDD to install and only impacts the video RAM usage.





Disclaimer: Smooth experience with HD textures requires a minimum amount of VRAM based on settings (4K, Ultra Preset, DXR and HD textures - min. 16GB. 1080p, High Preset - min. 12 GB). Players will receive a notification if they are out of memory and will experience texture quality degradation and potential performance or stability issues.

2429100.name: Homestar Runner: Halloween Hide n' Seek
2429100.detailed_description:
In this short, retro-style point n' click game, it's Halloween night and all of Homestar Runner's pals have hidden from him so he can't see their costumes. Explore 9 different locations - collecting items, solving puzzles, and talking to characters - as you help Homestar find all 11 of his dumb animal character friends so he can totally misinterpret their costumes like he always does!

It's like playing a Homestar Runner Halloween cartoon! That's a good thing, right?!



Featuring 100's of lines of FULLY VOICED dialog from your fave/not-fave characters from Homestar Runner dot com!

An optional Secret Quest to complete which unlocks a hidden easter egg.

All the humor, portmanteaus, and self-indulgent, self-referential jokes you'd expect from Homestar Runner content.

Discord Server

Join our Discord Server


About the Game



First person wave-based shooter being made solo by Shape de Grilo.
You must survive alone or with a friend. Earn gold to buy weapons and random abilities called Engines and earn experience to level up and unlock skills.

Features
  • Single Player / Co-op
  • Wave System
  • Slow Time: slow motion zombie killing
  • 9 different fire arms.
  • Level System: Earn experience to level up and choose up to 10 different skill to modify your game
  • 6 small monsters and 2 Elite monsters
  • Ragdoll physics

2428250.name: 侠客春秋 Demo
2428250.detailed_description:
桃李春风一杯酒，江湖夜雨十年灯。
我们做了一款江湖题材的高自由度角色扮演游戏，这个江湖只是你自己的江湖。
正义不是唯一的选择。
面对绝世武学，是选择众叛亲离私吞功法，还是上交掌门蛰伏待发？
身处险恶江湖，是胸怀正义弑魔证道，还是沦陷深渊为祸武林？
更多门派、武学以及功能玩法，高自由度不做太多束缚。
历练、奇遇、双修、传承，从寂寂无名到一代盟主。
每过一代就会成为下一代的先祖，战斗时可以唤醒祖宗十八代加入战场。
解锁更多羁绊，获得先祖传承，与道侣子嗣一同并肩作战！

2428230.name: OVERLODE: Battle over Azmonite
2428230.detailed_description:
Discord


WHAT CURATORS SAY

CzechLP "If you enjoy playing Starcraft II and Slay The Spire and the biggest dilemma in your life is which one to play this time, then a) you lead a simple life and b) you just need to play Battle over Azmonite!." RECOMMENDED


About the Game



A groundbreaking hybrid of deckbuilding and real-time action where you lead a squad of autonomous clone warriors and strategically play cards in real-time on the battlefield.

⏱️Play Cards in Real Time: Add the layers of timing and precise targeting to the deckbuilding genre.

🎭 Class-Based Gameplay: There are four unique playable classes, each shaping the cards you can select on each run.

🧬Defend The Harvester: Unlock and choose from 3 fundamentally different harvesters.

🌍Roguelike Rampage: Complete runs across 3 randomized planets and 11 unique biomes.

🃏Find and Collect: Collect 3 copies of a card to forge a more potent version. 3 Tiers for each card.

🌟High Replayability: The Ascension System raises the stakes with each successful run.

🔊Motivating Soundtracks & Effects: Increased immersion with a dynamic soundscape.






This intense and chaotic survival experience challenges players to master the game's intricacies and systems.

⏸️ Gameplay Slow and Pause: Control the pace by slowing the action or pausing to inspect cards.

🚀Simulated Projectiles: Standardized projectiles and explosions scale in size and pushback based on damage.

🎯Randomised Ballistics: Adding a layer of realism and randomness to your battles.

🛡️Armor & Shield Dynamics: Explore armour, shield mechanics, and penetration abilities.

🎯Automatic Strategic Targeting: Autonomous characters target enemies based on proximity, type, and direction.

📈Ascension Difficulty Levels: Incremental difficulty increases, offering high levels of mastery and replayability.

🔓Content Unlocks: Provides an evolving and engaging gameplay experience.

🔄Random Levels: 11 unique biomes of randomized level layouts.

📊Character Progression: Manage character level-ups based on individual performance in combat.

🃏Card Upgrades: Ability to find and collect 3 of the same card and forge a more powerful version.

🔄Loot Choices: Reroll randomized loot selections to maximize card upgrade opportunities.

🤖Squad Management: Build, maintain, and strategically maneuver your squad in fast-paced battles.

⚡Resource Management: Juggle energy and shield resources to play cards and keep your squad alive.

🌐Planet Node Variability: Navigate ever-changing planet layouts with randomized node arrangements.

🌿Biome-Specific Enemies: Encounter a stable of diverse enemies, randomly selected based on the biome.

🌀Formation Spawning: Hordes relentlessly come in randomized formations to test you.

📦Crates and Shard Drops: Randomized loot can be challenging to collect in time.






Azmonite is a powerful mineral that is a source of limitless energy collected by a range of unlockable harvesters. However, the abundance of Azmonite in this far-flung solar system has ignited a conflict between the invading human and native Arkinid factions.

As a Commander, your role is pivotal, and your strategic decisions will determine your squad's survival. You must navigate the chaos of real-time combat while harnessing the energy from nearby Azmonite.






Players face the challenge of choosing, managing, and strategically repositioning their squad through the precise timing, targeting, and selection of card plays. This gameplay element adds an extra layer of challenge beyond traditional turn-based deckbuilding.

The game adopts a roguelike format and incorporates an Ascension System inspired by Slay the Spire. This transparent system ensures exceptional replayability by incrementally unlocking content while increasing the difficulty level as you succeed. It is a compelling experience for players of all skill levels.

Arkinid formations are selected randomly based on the planet and biome. Their strength is influenced by darkness, the number of characters in the player's squad, and the number of deployed turrets at the time of spawn.

Central to survival is managing shields, which serve the dual purpose of protecting your assets from damage and powering some card-based abilities.

Drawing inspiration from renowned sci-fi franchises like Starcraft, the extensive and growing stable of Arkinids brings a fresh and engaging dynamic to the game.

The game leverages randomness across various elements, including node layouts, battlefields, enemy encounters, formations, and loot choices, ensuring that no two playthroughs are identical. This adds a layer of unpredictability and excitement to each session and makes learning the game mechanics more worthwhile.

Featuring high-quality VFX, dynamic combat soundtracks, voice acting, and a wide range of sound effects, the game aims to fully immerse players in its action-packed world.






Battle Over Azmonite introduces a card-forging system that enables players to combine three identical cards into a more potent version. Typically, these upgraded cards come at a higher energy cost, adding a layer of strategy to deck management.

Additionally, players can re-roll all their loot choices using their collected Azmonite reserves. This feature introduces critical and luck-based decision-making, allowing players to navigate their path flexibly and adaptably.

2428230.short_description: Play cards in real-time in this action-packed deckbuilding horde survival roguelike. Forge a deck, lead your squad, and defend the harvester in intense battles across enemy-infested planets. Unlock Ascension Levels to face rising challenges with incremental content and balance changes.

2428260.name: Butterfly//Circuit
2428260.detailed_description:
Mature Content Warning

Contains discussions of mature themes such as depression, suicide, drugs & alcohol, profanity, sexual references, violence.


About the Game



Unable to deal with the aftermath of what happened in her home town of Rzekiva, Amelia Morrison leaves for the city to try and pick up the pieces of what’s left.

The routine of every day life is comfortably numbing in its monotony, but no matter how much she tries to suppress them, the memories of that town always resurface. Despite the pain they cause, their persistence reveal that the events that transpired in Rzekiva may not have been what they seem.

As Amelia peels back the layers, the world around her starts to spiral and she alone stands in the middle of it all. Trust and truth become scarce commodities.



Butterfly//Circuit is set in the New European Federated Economic Territory (NEFET) in the grey city of Centropol. Surveillance, resource extraction and the policing of bodies are nothing if not the norm within the concrete grid, but Amelia has bigger things to worry about. Networks of conspiracy, hidden passages, and lost technoccultures permeate the the fabric of Centropol, and Morrison has to cut through the threads.

Crossing paths with faces both new and old, Amelia has to choose wisely who to trust, and who to keep at arms length.


From up and coming solo developer WireWARE with guidance from the MVU, Butterfly//Circuit is a cybergothic kinetic visual novel featuring a twisting drama laced with psychological horror inspired by the likes of Serial Experiments Lain, Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni, and the works of David Lynch.

Butterfly//Circuit creates a dark and tense reading experience supported by original art and an originally composed soundtrack featuring a variety of music ranging from pumping techno and chill trip-hop, to moody post-rock and atmospheric drones.

2428320.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Search for bonus collectibles and extra hidden object challenges!

  • Make matches, find details, memory, montage, and swap tiles, too!

  • Play through the game in any order you want!


Collector's Edition

  • 24 extra bonus levels!

  • Wallpapers and soundtrack also included!


About the Game

In Just Find It 2, prepare to be immersed in a thought-provoking collection of new games!

Find all the differences, make matches, play memory games, and challenging puzzles for unexpected surprises that will keep you engaged throughout your adventure.

Play 7 kinds of games and brace yourself for an unforgettable experience!

2428310.name: 天行镖客 (Sky Escort)
2428310.detailed_description:
In Sky Escort players' avatar is an airborne mercenary tasked with transporting goods across dangerous sky areas.

To defend off attacks from sky pirates, players could establish various defense mechanisms on their airship and upgrade their ship in an airborne harbor city, recruiting interesting crews with distinct talents.

Duty calls,escort succeed!


To establish defensive structures in the deserted sky, players need to find all accesses to supplies—everything depends on self-sufficiency.
Players need to allocate resources properly to construct various economic facilities on their airborne vessel, thus fueling arm construction and upgrades.

Balancing economic development and defensive arms will be key to winning the game.




Sky pirates have long set their sights on your airship, constantly raiding and plundering our cargo.

Constructing turrets on the airship enables automatic defending sky pirates, requiring players to strategically deploy these weapons.
However, the available space for building is limited,making players to consider how many weapons to build and how to most efficiently arrange them.

If the players fail to defend off sky pirates, clients' cargo will be looted, and the ship may even be destroyed.




Sky Escort is a card-driven game, where players build their own card decks while playing.

Differing from traditional turn-based card games, Sky Escort employs real-time gameplay, requiring players to quickly consider the order and strategy of their card plays, adding more tension and excitement.


The strength of a hero lies in their allies. Recruiting crew members for your airship can greatly enhance its capabilities.
While transporting goods, players can recruit crew members with various skills from hub cities.
Each crew member possesses different skills, and players can further enhance their skills through academy in harbor city.

You can also refit and upgrade your airship, making it more robust and powerful.
Each ship has multiple parts available for modification, with various components offering different abilities to choose from.


In the world of Sky Escort players can assume the role of various faction forces. Each faction has its unique systems and styles. Currently, the designed factions include:
  • Monarch: Ruling the skies through violence, the Monarch possesses strong commercial and industrial capabilities and forces slaves to work for them.
  • Panda Sages: Masters of gasification and powerful spellcasters, they can be unstoppable when maintaining the balance of yin and yang.
  • Wanderers: Exiles from the Empire, skilled in using robots for combat and possessing great creativity.


More factions are currently under development.


Hello, everyone! Relativity Art is a micro-team consisting of only two people.
Sky Escort is our studio's first game, and we sincerely appreciate everyone's support.
Our studio focuses on the development of management and strategy games, and we hope to bring you more interesting games in the future.

2428350.name: Light Fingers Demo
2428350.detailed_description:
Light Fingers is a magical mechanical board game where thieves compete in a test of skills to prove who among them is the most deft! Explore a randomly generated miniature board world that unfolds before you as you roll dice and move around to explore.

Seek out shops where you'll find cards to buy, special services for hire and chests of loot to plunder. Remember, always shop before you steal!


Raid Dungeons, where coins are a plenty, but deadly hazards are just as numerous. Here you will go up against your rivals who can defend the dungeon operating the traps while you attempt to loot its treasures.


Don't get caught! Play your hand of cards strategically or buy favors from the local inhabitants to avoid the guards and other players as you work your way back to the thieves hideout.

2428390.name: NovaLight Z
2428390.detailed_description:
The year is 2069 and technology has advanced dramatically. Corporations openly run the earth’s politics and governments. One of these corporations, NeuroTech recently invented a new type of integrated AI. This AI is implemented by nanobots in the blood stream. This collective of nanobots is called a S.P.I.R.I.T. The first iterations of implementation of Spirit tech were too invasive for normal humans. NeuroTech then developed technology to create lab grown humans that can withstand the Spirit fusion. The outcome was the creation of the Sentinel unit. Players will play as one of these sentinels. They are tasked to find an artifact in the base on the moon. Upon arrival the situation has elevated to catastrophic levels. Everyone in the base is dead and the Zombie outbreak has gone into full effect. It is up to the player and other sentinels to find the artifact and get it back home.

GamePlay
Combat has many layers to it besides shooting. Players can also melee attack with swords along with blocking. There are tactical and lethal grenades along with other throwables. Bullets will have differing velocities and damages, this affects players in varying ways depending on the bullet type used and the armor stats of the enemy. For example, a low velocity bullet will have a hard time going through heavy armor but may deal a great amount of damage to unarmored or light armored enemies. To add even more depth, bullets can come in different variants. Examples are incendiary, shock, armor piercing and more. Choosing the right tools for the job can make a situation less dire.

What makes Novalight’s combat different than other shooters is the way melee combat is done. Melee will have souls like mechanics with some major differences. This leads to fast paced gameplay while still having the option to take things slowly. The zombies are most sensitive to sound, attachments like silencers and throwable weapons like throwing knifes or hatchets will get things done quietly. Though since time to kill is relatively short, running and gunning is always an option.

Weapon Types
There will be different firearm categories like other shooters, these are:
Assault rifles, handguns. Shotguns, rocket launchers, grenade launchers and sniper rifles. Each weapon will have a specific ammo type tied to it. For example on AR can use 5.56 rounds while another uses 7.62 and so on.
There will be different melee weapons as well along with different throwables ranging from standard frags to throwing hatchets.

2428370.name: Ponk's Jam: The Tulip Thief
2428370.detailed_description:
Guess who’s back, dudes and gally?!
In an all new universe, Ponk is here to save the world of Obal from the threat of The Tulip Thief! In this Cuphead style, 2D platformer, you will meet many hilarious and interesting characters along the way to save the citizens of Obal. Embark on a huge journey through 6 crazy environments to retrieve the Artefacts from the 5 Beholders.
Will you be able to save your friends?


In this difficult, bullet-hell, platformer, perseverance is the key. There are 7 main boss battles for you to try and get through as well as 17 scenic and enjoyable levels. This may sound short but I challenge you to beat it as fast as you can because OMG this be a hard game. You will spend hours, and hours, trying to beat this challenging game!

The 6 Worlds of Obal are:
- Ponk Fields
- Sock Plains
- The Sky Desert
- Candyland
- Cruisin’ City
- The Goblin Caves

The 5 Beholders are:
- Calcius the Sock Guard
- Julie the Sky Watcher
- Sir. Candi IV
- Ike the Funk Master
- Gerkil the Goblin King


This time, use Ariel’s Abilities Shoppe and Barry’s Bizzare to choose from 6 different super abilities and 32 distinct hats to help Ponk style on these noobs. The abilities are almost like a super power and you can choose which one you want which is almost like a dream come true; who doesn’t want to choose their own super power?!

2428410.name: Light of Coco
2428410.detailed_description:
Light of Coco is a 3D puzzle platformer, played as a feline star creature named Coco.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE STORY

Light of Coco is a story about love, lonelines, hardship and determination. As you play, you will uncover little pieces of the story delivered via gameplay, level/character design, cinematics and interactive illustrations. The original soundtrack is designed to set the mood and guide the player through an emotional journey.

SOLVE PUZZLES WITH THE HELP OF YOUR COMPANIONS

Coco is small and gentle, and she has the most adorable, angelic meows. Use her voice to ask your butterfly companions to assist you with activating totems, opening doors, clearing ruble, lifting/carrying items, and so on. Aside from basic movement, you will have to rely on always having a butterfly around you to interact with the puzzles.

HEAL, PROTECT AND NURTURE

Your butterfly companions might get attacked, trapped or injured. It is your duty to keep them out of danger and use Coco's voice to shoo away any hostiles. Mistakes happen, and that's okay! That's because her voice has healing abilities and can help out those in need. Don't be shy to share your meows with other plants and creatures as well.

BEWARE OF THE SHADOWS

When there is light, there are also shadows. What evil creatures might be hiding in the darkness? No matter what, Coco must keep moving forward as her love is stronger than anything else. Be ready to hide, run and face her fears.

2428460.detailed_description:
① Game Content

You were a miss in the manor, but an accident completely disrupted the trajectory of your life... When the whole world is falling, where do you go in the face of the terrible truth and the unknown future?

② Game Features

a. The works are divided into bright and dark lines
Bright Line can attack characters include Lucien\Kasa\Dempsey
Dark Line can attack characters include Hubert
Total target audience: 4 people
b. Complete dubbing of the work
c. Drive the development of the story based on the player's choice, with super high degrees of freedom
d. Unique painting style, both vertical painting and CG are exclusively customized
e. The artwork is exquisitely crafted and comes with high-resolution background images
f. The game comes with built-in prompts, so you won't be afraid to miss important storylines anymore!
g. Diverse gameplay with up to 20+endings and built-in male main touch system

③ GamePlay

a. The work has a total of [20 endings], including one [0 hidden endings]
【 0 Hidden Ending 】 You can open the treasure chest in the main interface's secret channel to obtain it, and after obtaining it, you can activate the interstage gameplay.
b. All four male protagonists are equipped with touch systems, which can chat, switch music, and change scenes, creating a full atmosphere!
c. High degree of freedom! According to the different choices, the subsequent triggered plot will also be different, and the ending will be chosen by oneself!
d. The female lead has multiple personalities to choose freely! Whether it's a black rose or a red rose is up to you!!
e. In the game, there is a key pulling mini game, and the plot game is no longer monotonous!Draw ten ordinary keys to exchange for one master key. The master key is used for "opening the door and peeping", and God's perspective is easy to get!

2428420.name: Umbraclaw
2428420.detailed_description:
Find hope in death.

Umbraclaw tells the story of Kuon, a house cat who has died in the mortal world, after she awakens in the Soulplane, a realm of the dead. She must challenge the perilous underworld to return home to her owner in this 2D action adventure.

The player controls the cat Kuon as she searches for a way to open the "Boundary" to the mortal world and return home.
The dangerous terrain and frightful fiends of the Soulplane present a near impossible challenge for a mere house cat.
Any single hit to the tiny feline means instant death.
However, it also means a new chance—Kuon has the power of "Anima Revive" to revive her with a new skill each time to help her overcome the trial before her.

Kuon's story can meet a multitude of endings depending on her and the player's actions and choices. Her struggles to break the cycle of life and death may even touch your very soul.

1: Find hope in death with “Anima Revive”!
Kuon is a mere mortal cat. Any damage in the Soulplane is enough to kill her instantly. However, the mysterious "Anima Revive" power will bring her back to life with new skills by absorbing the soul of another animal, thus increasing her survival capability.
Kuon can become even stronger by transforming into a humanoid form, but...
Kuon can only revive up to 9 times. "Cats have nine lives," after all.
Will Kuon be able to escape the Soulplane before all nine of her lives are lost?

2: Traverse an enchantingly dark and stunning underworld
Kuon’s journey home is lavishly rendered with hand-drawn art, in a style of paper cut-out art. Each twisted enemy and environment has been lovingly crafted by the INTI CREATES art team.

3: A story that will leave a mark on your “soul”
A single cat’s “death” begins a cycle of rebirth.
As Kuon struggles to return home, she will cross paths with other souls fallen to the underworld, both like and unlike her.
Kuon's story can meet a multitude of endings depending on her and the player's actions and choices.
Will you be able to keep your humanity, and Kuon’s felinity, until the very end?

Kuon’s journey home is lavishly rendered with hand-drawn art, in a style of paper cut-out art. Each twisted enemy and environment has been lovingly crafted by the INTI CREATES art team.

3: A story that will leave a mark on your “soul”
A single cat’s “death” begins a cycle of rebirth.
As Kuon struggles to return home, she will cross paths with other souls fallen to the underworld, both like and unlike her.
Kuon's story can meet a multitude of endings depending on her and the player's actions and choices.
Will you be able to keep your humanity, and Kuon’s felinity, until the very end?
2428420.short_description: Umbraclaw tells the story of Kuon, a house cat who has died in the mortal world, after she awakens in the Soulplane, a realm of the dead. She must challenge the perilous underworld to return home to her owner in this 2D action adventure.

2428480.name: Irang : the last hope
2428480.detailed_description:
Game Universe

Joseon, a magical kingdom honoring the Four Deities. However, it is in chaos due to the corruption of the ruling class and the repeated rebellions of the ruled class. The nobles, in an attempt to steal the power of the Four Deities, have unleashed the sealed evil spirits, bringing various calamities to Joseon. Amidst this turmoil, the Yellow Dragon, a servant of the Azure Dragon, chooses 'Irang', a girl of pure heart, as the last hope of Joseon. Irang, endowed with the power of the Yellow Dragon, must overcome all the challenges of the civil service examination and liberate the Four Deities.

Game Introduction

"Irang: The Last Hope" is a very unique Metroidvania style single-player game. The main characters of this game are a girl 'Irang' and a haetae 'Haru' who received power from the Yellow Dragon. Their goal is to liberate the Four Deities to survive in a world where everything has collapsed and perished. The gameplay is very unique, and the player helps them pass various tests and overcome obstacles to liberate the Four Deities on their journey.

Game Features

ㆍComplex and challenging level design: Each level has a unique and complex design, offering new challenges to players. Demonstrate your true skills as you overcome each level.


ㆍUnique game mechanics: Players need to develop their own strategies using various game mechanics such as the timeline of light, mirage, and custom skills. These unique mechanics add a new dimension to the gameplay.

ㆍUnique world set in the Joseon era: "Irang: The Last Hope" is set in the serene and beautiful Joseon era. This world offers players a unique and attractive experience. In this world where mythical beings like the Four Deities and evil spirits exist and magic is realized, players can write their own destiny.

2428470.name: Stars, Stripes, and Subgames
2428470.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Pick and play any level!

  • Beautiful soundtrack!

  • 16 types of subgames!

  • Make gameplay easier with the Hint funtion!

  • Trivia about the USA!


Collector's Edition

  • 39 extra levels

  • Music Player

  • Wallpapers


About the Game

Discover the wisdom of the founding fathers through intriguing puzzles featuring quotes from the visionaries who shaped a nation. Test your knowledge of famous Americans as you unravel clues and unlock fascinating anecdotes about iconic figures who left an indelible mark on history.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of America's landscapes through mesmerizing jigsaw puzzles featuring breathtaking locations from sea to shining sea.

With every challenge, Stars, Stripes, and Subgames ensures a patriotic celebration of American heritage, culture, and ingenuity.

This wonderful nude beach has been invaded by a horde of women in admittingly fashionable swimsuits, so it's up to a lone naked samurai to enforce the undress code!

In this casual lewd game you must use one hand to slice away the clothing of each girl that is thrown your way. While your other hand is free to relax and catch some sun.

Pick up your trusty sword and slash away those offending swimsuits! But watch out for those sexy looking bombs!

-Adventure Mode (Travel the Beach of Swimsuit Samurai, hone your skills and unlock the power of the blade
-Face new challenges that twist the unique gameplay (Hit targets in 'border patrol', red light green light and many more!)

2428520.name: Quest for Gold
2428520.detailed_description:
In Quest for Gold you control squads of knights and archers to defend your castle from attacking waves of Goblins. They will attack you with various weapons such as TNT throwers, flame-torches and even exploding barrels.



Your troops are grouped into squads of multiple units. This way you can easily position your troops to block the Goblins from reaching your castle.



Whenever you've defeated a Goblin wave you will be given a choice of strategic resources to use. Replace squad losses or build towers to prepare for the next wave.

Gold Rush! Expeditions are sent from all parts of the realm to new found lands where vast mines of gold have been discovered. The king has sent you on a quest to go to these lands and participate in the gold rush. Will you be able to mine the gold or will the Goblin threat prove too tough?

2428520.short_description: Quest for Gold is a charming real-time tactics game. Defend your kingdom against increasingly difficult waves of Goblin attackers with relaxed squad-based controls. Mine gold to reach a high score or spend precious time building up your defenses in-between waves.

2428560.name: Druidwalker Soundtrack
2428560.detailed_description:
Druidwalker soundtrack - 6 in-game music tracks made by Līga Griķe using traditional Latvian instrument kokle, provided in mp3 format.

The soundtrack is going to be available in your library and on the game page itself under "Additional Soundtrack", but in case you want to access the files directly: right click on your game in Steam library, select "properties" -> go to "local files" tab -> click on "browse local files." The soundtrack is located in the game's "Soundtrack" folder.

2428600.name: Masquerade Kiss
2428600.detailed_description:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

The protagonist of Masquerade Kiss is a capable secret agent with a powerful sense of justice. She seeks to expose the nefarious deeds of "the worst man in the world," and so sneaks closer to him under an assumed alias.
However, the more she gets to know him, the stronger the pull of attraction gets. She's in danger of falling in love.
As this thrilling, spicy tale unfolds, she'll have to choose between the mission and her heart.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
My name, my job - it's all a lie.
But this love is real.

Who wins in the game of seduction? You're an elite agent tasked with taking down the most corrupt people in the world.
However, your latest target may be your most challenging yet. His hand slips into your dress, fingers dangerously close to the wire hidden in your lingerie...
"You think you can take me? Go ahead, try." You're playing a dangerous game now, one without winners...

Characters:
Kazuomi Shido "Dangerous, Bewitching Charms"
Yuzuru Shiba "Icy, Inimical Eyes & Bracingly Hot Lips"
Kei Soejima "The Sensual Demon Lurking Behind a Smile"
Boss "The Man You Admire"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until Season 2

2428640.name: Net Defender
2428640.detailed_description: Net Defender is a VR game that lets you experience the thrill of being a goalkeeper in a futuristic football match. You have to use your hands to block the shots from the opposing team, which come at you at different speeds and angles. The game tracks your movements and scores you based on how many shots you save and how many you let in. Net Defender is not only fun, but also good for your health. It makes you move around and exercise your reflexes and coordination. If you love soccer and VR, you will love Net Defender!

2428620.name: Feeble Light
2428620.detailed_description:
Bring light to the darkened cosmos as a courageous little star!



Blast off as a little star trying to rid the cosmos of angry celestial beings in Feeble Light, a 3-tone pixel art shoot’em up where minimalistic presentation makes way for precision controls and fluid animation! Inspired by genre classics, Feeble Light is a vertical bullet hell where you’ll fire at enemies with starlight, dodge asteroids, evade incoming projectiles and build up bomb energy for devastating counterattacks! In a tight spot?

Slow down your little star for extra precision to navigate through bullet swarms or narrow passages. Master 5 thoughtfully crafted stages, randomized with each playthrough to keep you on your toes as you chase the high score, then take down big bosses to free the cosmos and earn new color palettes to customize your experience in future runs!



Features:

  • Blast through 5 randomized stages of vertical shoot’em up action!
  • Dodge attacks and enemy swarms in bullet hell style.
  • Charge up bomb energy for special attacks!
  • Slow down your movement for higher precision in tight situations.
  • Choose from multiple color palettes and earn more through skillful play!

2428660.name: OpenFlower
2428660.detailed_description:
Visual novel. The action of which takes place in a small Japanese family. Just moved to a big city full of surprises and adult adventures. You have to plunge into the life of an unemployed husband and his beautiful wife. Your choices will help her grow in the company. You can influence her promiscuity, depravity and communication skills with other men. The game develops around the Hot Wife fetish. Most of the scenes in it can be classified by the NTR tag. If you like this idea, you will definitely love the game. Can you make your Hot Wife open for the new adventures as a flower?

The game and game images are in 1920*1080 format. The format is scalable. The quality of the pictures will pleasantly surprise you with a stylized cartoon photo realistic look. The characters have their own character, change throughout the story and develop along with the main character.

The original language is English. The game is fully translated into Spanish and Hindi. It contains a video, soundtrack, a story that continues for a month and has several endings that depend on your choice. At the moment, the game is represented by version 1.17 and is fully completed.

2427770.name: Burger Cooking Simulator
2427770.detailed_description:
Become the burger chef in the physical-based Burger Cooking Simulator.
Skillfully use your hand to interact with ingredients and utensils to complete orders.
Grill, fry, make burgers, watch your time, and keep your customers in a good mood.
Don't forget to keep the dishes clean and, most importantly, be safe in the kitchen.

Features:
  • Cooking
    - Grilling
    - Frying
    - 4 burger recipes (8 ingredients, 6 sauces)
  • Washing
  • Unusual gameplay control
  • Realistic physics

Become the burger chef in the physical-based Burger Cooking Simulator.
Skillfully use your hand to interact with ingredients and utensils to complete orders.
Grill, fry, make burgers, watch your time, and keep your customers in a good mood.

2427790.name: Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaíra
2427790.detailed_description:
Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaira is an action RPG that transports the player to a prison on the darkest and coldest side of a distant planet. Survive massive battles, form alliances, and find answers to your exile in this hostile and unforgiving environment.

Explore and Face the Dangers of Nebegarde

The inhospitable open-air prison on the icy side of a distant planet, where the worst criminals are sent with their memories erased. Venture forth and immerse yourself in a dense plot filled with dilemmas and choices that will reveal the different faces of a reality previously unknown as you seek to understand the reason for your own exile.

Master Combat

With combat requiring strategy and skill, Goldilock One offers a unique blend of hack 'n' slash against multiple enemies and more paced moments with challenging foes that will demand more self-preservation.

Form Alliances

Develop relationships with various NPCs; depending on your decisions, some may join your adventure as companions. Switch control between them in real-time, accessing unique challenges and previously inaccessible areas.

Face Unique Enemies

Challenge creatures ranging from native beings of a new planet to genetically modified creatures and even futuristic machines. Encounter creations inspired by mythological elements from various cultures and Brazilian folklore.

Venture Solo or in Cooperation

Take on this challenge alone or enjoy party moments by inviting a friend to join in split-screen with local or online multiplayer (via Remote Play Together).

Open World and Exploration: Nebegarde is a vast territory full of dangers and mysteries. Explore varied environments, discover secrets, and forge alliances with NPCs to increase your chances of survival.

Party System and Cooperation: Control different members of your group, each with unique abilities that can be combined to overcome challenges and solve complex puzzles.

Unique Graphics and Design: A visual style that mixes realistic elements with cel-shaded stylized art, evoking the aesthetic of graphic novels and comic books.

Dynamic Narrative and Dilemma System: Your decisions shape the world around you. The game's dilemma system offers multiple ways to complete quests and solve puzzles, with outcomes that deeply affect the story's progression.
